hypo: This is one of the important skills certificates besides a driving license!

src: 普及一下：急救措施其实是做发生突发事件时候的应急救援，即在救护车来之前的抢救。
tgt: For your information: first aid measures refer to emergency rescue in emergencies, i.e., emergency treatment conducted before the coming of the ambulance.
hypo: Make sure to include these words: emergency treatment, the coming.

src: 众所周知，在事故发生后救护车来的过程中其实是还有一段时间的，而正是这段时间才是最关键的。
tgt: As everyone knows, there is a period before the coming of the ambulance after the accident happens, which is most critical.
hypo: In the process of rescuing a car after an accident, there is actually a period of time, which is the most critical.

src: 这个时候便是需要急救的时候。
tgt: This period is the most important time for first aid.
hypo: This is the time when rescue is needed.

src: 如果我真的发生了心脏病、脑溢血、呼吸骤停，那么我们生命的窗口只有四分钟，黄金四分钟！
tgt: If we suffer from heart attack, cerebral hemorrhage or respiratory arrest, our life window is only four minutes, the golden four minutes!
hypo: If we experience heart disease, brain hemorrhage, and respiratory arrest, our life window is only four minutes - golden four minutes!

src: 所以身边的人懂得急救是多么重要呀！
tgt: So it is very important for those around us to know first aid!
hypo: Why is helping those around you so important?

src: 当我们身边有人倒下的时候，我们可以通过专业的知识去对他进行抢救，而不是傻傻地站在那里一动不动什么也做不了，这种无助的感觉太让人感到可怕了。
tgt: When somebody falls down, we can conduct first aid with our professional knowledge, instead of doing nothing and only standing there; this helpless feeling is really frightening.
hypo: When somebody falls, instead of standing there doing nothing, it's really frightening.

src: “在中国，我们官方数据每年有三百万人意外死亡，最危险的叫心脏骤停。
tgt: “In China, 3 million people die from accidents every year according to official data, and the most dangerous one is known as cardiac arrest.
hypo: In China, according to official data, there are around 300,000 unexpected deaths every year, making cardiac arrest the most dangerous cause of sudden death.

src: 在美国全国是平均15%能救过来。
tgt: 15% of people of cardiac arrest can be brought back to life in the United States.
hypo: In the United States, 15% of people are able to be brought back to life.

src: 在拉斯维加斯的赌场酒店，百分之七八十能救过来，上海、北京低于1%。”
tgt: In the Casino Hotel in Las Vegas, 70% or 80% of them can be brought back to life, and the proportion in Shanghai and Beijing is lower than 1%. ”
hypo: At the casino in Las Vegas, up to seventy-eight percent of gamblers can be rescued, while Beijing and Shanghai are below one percent.

src: 这是第一反应创始人陆乐说的。
tgt: Said Lu Le, the founder of the First Reaction.
hypo: This is what the founder of Reaction said.

src: 如果一个人发生了心脏骤停，呼吸没有了，心跳没有了，你掐人中是没有任何作用的。
tgt: Pinching philtrum has no effect at all if a person suffers from cardiac arrest and there is no sign of breathing or heartbeat.
hypo: If someone experiences cardiac arrest, respiration stops, heartbeat stops, and there is no effect on the person.

src: 必须做人工呼吸、胸外按压才有可能把人救过来。
tgt: Artificial respiration and external chest compression are required to bring them back to life.
hypo: It is necessary to perform artificial respiration, chest compression, and external cardiac massage in order to bring people back to life.

src: 我发现我们现在还很少人会有这种意识去学习急救，但是当事情发生的时候就来不及了，所以还是呼吁大家都去学习一下这个技能，让我们在面对突发状况的时候能够及时作出反应。
tgt: I found that very few people have the awareness to study first aid knowledge, but it will be too late once accident happens; therefore, I appeal to everyone to learn this skill, so that we can respond timely when faced with emergency situations.
hypo: We are still lacking in awareness of this skill, but when the situation arises, it's too late to study. Therefore, I urge everyone to take the time to learn this skill, so that we can be prepared to respond quickly in the event of an emergency.

src: 说不定还能挽救一个人的生命！
tgt: We may bring somebody back to life with this skill!
hypo: It is possible to save somebody's life!

src: 郑州宜欣是国内混凝土检查井模块砖机设备，检查井砌块机械，井壁墙体模块机械专业的生产厂家，从半自动到全自动化生产线。
tgt: Zhengzhou Yixin is a specialized manufacturer of concrete inspection shaft module brick equipment, inspection shaft building block machinery and shaft wall module equipment, with semi-automatic and automatic production lines.
hypo: Zhengzhou Yixin is a professional manufacturer of brick-making machines, ranging from semi-automatic to fully-automated production lines.

src: 通过多年的实践和开发，现具备了质量过硬，主要生产液压式、移动式、全自动化检查井系列设备及配套装置。
tgt: Based on practice and development of many years, it is engaged in production of high quality hydraulic type, mobile type and automatic inspection shaft series of equipment and supporting devices.
hypo: Through years of practice and development, we have acquired quality hardness, mainly producing hydraulic, mobile, and automatic check-in series equipment and accessories.

src: 检查井混凝土模块生产加工设备 郑州井壁砖模块设备组装现场：

src: 检查井混凝土模块生产加工设备 郑州井壁砖模块设备的特点及优势:
tgt: Inspection shaft concrete module production and processing equipment, the characteristics and advantages of Zhengzhou shaft wall brick module equipment
hypo: Check the features and advantages of concrete module production equipment in Zhengzhou.

src: 宜欣检查井砌块砖机设备广泛适用于煤、热、水、电、气等市政地下构筑物的新型砌筑材料。
tgt: Yixin inspection shaft module brick equipment is widely applied in new-type masonry materials for municipal underground structures for coal, heating, electricity and gas.
hypo: This new type of shaft construction material is suitable for coal, hot, water, electric, and gas construction projects.

src: 如：排水、储水设施的各类检查井、雨水口、方沟、化粪池及小型构筑物、桥梁翼墙等。
tgt: Foe example: various types of inspection shafts, gutter inlets, box drains, septic tanks, small-sized structures and wing walls of bridges for drainage and water storage facilities.
hypo: Drainage systems such as drainage ditches, culverts, channels, ponds, and small buildings, bridges, and walls.

src: 使用混凝土模块筑建检查井的优势在于模块的上下左右四周均为凹凸槽结构，组合砌筑形成链锁。
tgt: The advantage of building inspection shafts using concrete modules is that the four sides of the modules are of concave groove structures, which are built to form chain locks.
hypo: The advantages of using concrete to form the walls and roof of the structure are:  1. Concrete is strong and durable.  2. It is easy to form complex shapes with concrete.  3. Combined with rebar, it can form a lock-and-key mechanism.

src: 井壁墙体抗剪力远优于平摩擦砌体的砌筑形式。
tgt: The shearing resistance of the shaft wall is far better than the masonry form of the flat friction of the brickwork.
hypo: Brickwork is superior to rammed earth construction in terms of resistance.

src: 模块为中空结构，组合砌筑后纵向孔孔相通，横向孔孔相贯，孔芯浇注后，形成现浇混凝土网状结构，起到了二次补强和防水作用。
tgt: The modules are of hollow structure, with connected holes vertically and interpenetrated horizontally; the cast-in-place concrete mesh structure is formed after pouring of the cores of holes, playing the role of secondary reinforcement and waterproof.
hypo: The hollow structure is reinforced with secondary reinforcement to make it waterproof.

src: 模块纵横均设有插筋槽，横向卧筋、纵向插筋相应提高结构整体强度。

src: 国际橄榄油协会将橄榄油分为初榨橄榄油（Virgin Olive Oil）和精炼橄榄油（Lampante Olive Oil或Refined Olive Oil）两大类，五个级别。
tgt: The International Olive Oil Association divides olive oil into two categories, Virgin Olive Oil and Lampante Olive Oil or Refined Olive Oil, and five levels.
hypo: International Olive, olive oil will be divided into two categories: Virgin Olive Oil and Lampante Olive Oil or Refined Olive Oil, with five grades.

src: 初榨橄榄油或称为天然橄榄油，是直接从新鲜的橄榄果实中采取机械冷榨、经过过滤等处理除去异物后得到的油脂。
tgt: Virgin olive oil, also known as natural olive oil, is oil obtained from fresh olive fruit after removing foreign matters by mechanical cold pressing and filtering.
hypo: Olive oil, also known as natural olive oil, is mechanically cold-pressed from fresh olives and filtered to remove impurities.

src: 根据酸度的不同可分为三个级别：

hypo: There are three levels of acidity: low, medium, and high.

src: 特级初榨橄榄油（Extra Virgin）：是最高级别、质量最高的橄榄油，是纯天然产品。
tgt: Extra Virgin: is the highest level, best quality olive oil, a pure natural product.
hypo: Extra Virgin Olive Oil is the best, highest quality product. It is a pure, natural product.

src: 口味绝佳，有淡雅怡人的植物芬芳，酸度不超过1%。

hypo: The fragrance of the plant was exquisite and its acidity did not exceed 1%.

src: 优质初榨橄榄油（Fine Virgin）：酸度稍高，但不超过2%，味道纯正、芳香。

hypo: Higher acidity, but not more than 2%, pure and aromatic.

src: 普通初榨橄榄油（Ordinary Virgin）：口味与风味尚可，酸度不超过3.3%。
tgt: Ordinary Virgin: taste and flavor are acceptable, with an acidity of no more than 3.3%.
hypo: The Ordinary Virgin has a mild flavor and acidity level of no more than 3.3%.

src: 精炼橄榄油是指酸度超过3.3%的初榨橄榄油精炼后所得到的橄榄油，或成为“二次油”。
tgt: Refined Olive Oil refers to olive oil obtained from the refining of virgin olive oil with an acidity of over 3.3%, also called as “secondary oil”.
hypo: The refers to secondary oil which is obtained by refining tertiary oil with a sulfur content exceeding 3.3%.

src: 精炼橄榄油可分为两个级别：

hypo: The oil can be divided into two categories: refined and unrefined.

src: 普通橄榄油（Olive Oil）：精炼橄榄油与一定比例的初榨橄榄油混合，以调和味道与颜色，其酸度在1.5%以下，呈透明的淡金黄色。
tgt: Olive Oil: is refined olive oil mixed with virgin olive oil in a certain proportion to adjust the taste and color, has an acidity of under 1.5% and a transparent light gold color.
hypo: Extra-virgin olive oil is a blend of pure olive oil and a certain proportion of refined olive oil, with a balance of flavor, taste, and color. Its acidity is below 1.5%, giving it a golden yellow color.

src: 精炼橄榄杂质油或橄榄果渣油（Refined Olive-Pomace Oil）：是通过溶解法从油渣中提取并经过精炼而得到的橄榄油。
tgt: Refined Olive-Pomace Oil is olive oil obtained and refined from pomace with dissolution method.
hypo: Refined Olive-Pomace Oil is obtained by extracting and refining olive oil from pomace.

src: 看过等级分类的你应该已经发现，橄榄油的酸度是一个非常重要的指标。

src: 其实对于身体微胖的女孩子穿衣搭配的讲究很多。
tgt: Actually, there are many tricks for slightly overweight girls to match their clothes.
hypo: For overweight girls, there is much to consider when it comes to dressing and grooming.

src: 身体胖的女孩穿的裙子不能太短或太长，长度差不多在膝盖，刚好能盖住大腿胖的地方即可。
tgt: Slightly overweight girls shall wear skirts not too long or too short; they shall be of the length at around the knees, just covering the fat part of the thighs.
hypo: The dress cannot be too short or too long, just right for covering the slightly overweight area.

src: 裙子过短就会把腿上的肥胖显露出来。
tgt: The fat thighs will be shown if the skirt is too short.
hypo: If the skirt is too short, it will expose the fat on the thighs.

src: 过长就会给人矮而胖的感觉。
tgt: Skirts that are too long will make you look short and fat.
hypo: The feeling of being overweight is uncomfortable.

src: 如果穿出分出上中下三段来，就显得你自然增高了，就是上身、裙和长筒袜用不同的颜色，看上去就会产生一种修长的感觉 。
tgt: If you are dressed in three sections, upper, middle and lower, you will naturally look taller; that is, use different colors for upper body, skirt and stockings, and you will look taller and slimmer.
hypo: If you wear different colored stockings and slimmer trousers, it will give you a sense of elevation.

src: 其实很多深色系的衣服是微胖女孩子们的标配（这一点作者深有体会），深颜色也是掩盖你身体胖的好方法，高贵典雅的黑色短裙也是微胖女孩的首选。
tgt: In fact, a lot of darker color clothes are what slightly overweight girls all have, which the author deeply agrees; dark colors are good methods to cover fatness of your bodies; in addition, noble and elegant black short shirts are best choices for slightly overweight girls.
hypo: The author is well aware that many deep-hued garments are the preferred choice of petite girls, as they conceal their body and add an air of sophistication to any outfit. Deep colors are also a great way to add an elegant touch to an ensemble.

src: 穿上深颜色的衣服，特别是黑色的短裙，会让人觉得你瘦一些。
tgt: You will look slimmer in dark clothes, especially black short skirts.
hypo: Wearing the dark-colored clothing, especially the black pants, will make you look slimmer.

src: 如果小腿很胖，你的袜子和鞋不要穿得太让人注意。
tgt: Wear stockings and low-key shoes if your calves are fat.
hypo: If your calves are large, your stockings and shoes should not be too noticeable.

src: 越大众化越好，颜色也不要太鲜艳了。
tgt: The more common the better; the color shouldn’t be too bright.
hypo: As colors become more common, they don't have to be too bright.

src: 以免人们对你的腿部和脚部注意时，让人得到肥胖的感觉。
tgt: In case people will notice your legs and feet and think you’re fat.

src: 对于微微稍胖的女孩子一定要讲就好穿衣搭配的诀窍。
tgt: Slightly overweight girls shall master the tricks for clothing matching.

src: 微胖女孩千万不要穿紧身的短裙，另外上衣不要过短或者塞在裙子里，会让人看了很不舒服，如果腿粗的话，要穿黑色的长筒袜或者网格袜(细格子的那种哦)，选择质地柔软的印花喇叭裙，搭配一件荡领的上衣，可以很好的掩盖胖女孩的不足。
tgt: Slightly overweight girls shall never wear close-fitting short skirts and the upper outer garment shall not be too short or tucked inside the skirt, which seem strange; slightly overweight girls with thicker legs shall wear black stockings or mesh stockings (thin meshes), a flare skirt with print pattern and soft texture, and a loose-collar upper outer garment to cover the defects of the body.
hypo: It is advisable to choose a slightly loose-fitting dress that flares slightly at the waist and comes with a loose-collared shirt to cover up any slight overweight. Alternatively, you can opt for a black or gray long-sleeve dress or a net-like patterned one, paired with a comfortable and soft fabric blouse, to conceal the slight flaw.

src: 当然了，微胖的女孩儿在穿短裙上也是有讲究的。

src: 日昌餐馆(五道口店)

hypo: Richang Restaurant (Five-door Restaurant)

src: [薄荷]环境： 中规中矩 [服务铃]服务： 上菜很快 「古法马拉糕」我的必点菜 马拉糕太香太软太好吃了😋喜欢甜品的小伙伴一定要试试「东江墨鱼滑酿豆腐煲」汤非常鲜美 豆腐很嫩 墨...
tgt: Emoji mint, environment is average, emoji service Bell, as for service, the dishes were served fast, “traditional Cantonese sponge cake” is one I must order, the cake is so soft, sweet and delicious😋; you must try it if you like dessert, and “Dongjiang tofu casserole with cuttlefish balls” has nice soup, tender tofu and...
hypo: My favorite dish was the tender tofu. The dishes were cooked very quickly and it tasted like a dessert. I definitely recommend trying the East Java smoked eel and fermented soybean curd. The smoked eel was very tender and the fermented soybean curd was very fragrant and delicious.

src: 味道赞 肉类好 服务热情
tgt: Nice taste, great meat, enthusiastic service
hypo: The restaurant offers great meat and enthusiastic service.

src: 好久没来日昌了，水果捞还是那么好喝&真材实料足，第一次点叉烧包，就是我爱的松软面粉的南方口感！
tgt: I haven’t been to Richang for a long time, and the Fruit Mix is still delicious and has a lot of real stuff in it, it was the first time for me to order Cha Siu Bao, and it has the Southern taste with fluffy flour which I enjoyed!
hypo: It has been so long since I had Shanghai cuisine, but the taste of the sweet potato and real material still lingers in my mouth. The first time I tried the steamed bun, it was love at first sight!

src: 煲仔饭干湿成程度正好，份量非常足，招牌锡纸鸡翅一如既往赞，例汤也不错，芥兰处理得也比较...
tgt: The wetness of the clay pot rice was just right, and the portion was generous, the special tinfoil chicken wings were great as always, the soup was nice as well, the cabbage mustard was also...
hypo: The food was delicious and there was plenty of it. The portions were very satisfying and the service was excellent. The soup was flavorful, the chicken was tender, and the vegetables were cooked perfectly.

src: 味道赞 服务热情 肉类好

hypo: Delightful enthusiasm for meat dishes.

src: 日昌老店 好多年前也是网红的存在吧，东单小楼，木地板。

hypo: Richang Old Shop Used to Be Popular Years Ago, East Tower, Wooden Plank.

src: 门口总是要等很久才能吃上的煲仔饭，煲仔饭的砂锅都开裂了…

hypo: You have to wait for a long time before you can eat the steamed bun, as the steamed bun oven has already broken...

hypo: It has been several years since I last visited Chengdu, and the variety of small restaurants has dispersed the customer flow.

hypo: It is difficult to find a seat in the restaurant, but the food quality is not as good as before.

src: 三杯鸡：配菜有点多，鸡肉稍微有点少。

hypo: The chicken was a little bit small in size, but the vegetables were plentiful.

src: 主要调的这个味道有点偏差，底味的咸不够，就凸显了甜味了，大家可以脑补一下甜+各种香料配菜...
tgt: It was mainly because the flavor was a little off, the base was not salty enough and the sweetness was exaggerated, you can imagine sweetness + various spice and garnish...
hypo: The flavor of this dish is slightly off, the bottom note is lacking, so we can garnish it with various herbs and spices to imagine sweetness...

src: 红牌威士忌喝法是什么？
tgt: How to drink Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky?
hypo: What is the English translation for "红牌威士忌喝法" (How is the English translation for this)?

src: 每个人的爱好不同，有人喜欢收藏，有人喜欢美食，当然也有人喜欢品酒，红牌威士忌是目前各个国家最畅销的苏格兰威士忌之一，而且红牌威士忌曾获国际洋酒大赛金奖。
tgt: Different people have different preferences; some like to collect, some like food, and certainly some like wine tasting; Johnnie Walker Red Label is one of the fastest selling Scottish whiskies in the world and has won the gold prize of International Wine Competition.
hypo: Everyone's tastes are different; some people like to collect things, some like to eat, others like to drink, and some have even won international wine awards.

src: 每一瓶红牌威士忌都有独特的味道，不过如果不知道如何品味它，岂不是糟蹋了它的醇香。
tgt: Each bottle of Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky has its own unique flavor, but if you don’t know how to taste it, it would be such a waste of its mellow fragrance.
hypo: Each bottle of wine has its own unique flavor, but if you don't know how to appreciate it, you have missed the aroma of its flavor.

src: 那么红牌威士忌怎么喝呢？
tgt: Then how do we drink Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky?
hypo: Why are you drinking that red wine?

src: 小编为大家简单介绍下。
tgt: I’ll introduce for you now.
hypo: Now I will simply introduce it to you.

src: 红牌威士忌喝法：
tgt: How to drink Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky:
hypo: Make sure to include these words: How

src: 尊尼获加红牌威士忌由约35种苏格兰威士忌调配而成，具有浓郁芳香及传统苏格兰威士忌的特质，浓郁芳香中带有甘甜及烟熏香味。
tgt: Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky is blended with around 35 kinds of Scotch Whiskies, possesses rich fragrance and the characteristics of traditional Scotch whisky, with both sweetness and smoked smell in its rich fragrance.
hypo: Scotch whiskies are blended from up to 35 different malt and grain distilleries in Scotland, giving it a rich and robust flavor profile with sweet and smoky aromas.

src: 入口浓醇清新，略带香草及浓烈的烟熏麦芽味道。
tgt: It is mellow and fresh in the mouth, with a slight taste of vanilla and strong smoked malt.
hypo: The entrance was filled with the sweet aroma of freshly brewed tea and the mellow fragrance of freshly cut grass.

src: 该酒可以直接加冰饮用，或者与最喜爱的饮品混合饮用。
tgt: The wine can be drunk directly with ice or mixed with your favorite drinks.
hypo: The wine can be drunk directly or mixed with favorite drinks.

src: 红牌威士忌进入国内,为了适应国人的口味,红牌威士忌+可乐或雪碧或新奇士等气泡饮料成为一种经久不衰的时尚。
tgt: After Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky entered China, in order to adapt to the tastes of Chinese people, drinking Red Label whisky with bubble beverage such as Cola, Sprite or Sunkist has become an enduring fashion.
hypo: The popularity of bubble tea has made it a timeless fashion.

src: 这些甜味的饮料，除了可以中和酸味,在视觉上能给人带来愉悦，加入饮料,起到冲淡酒味改变口感的效果。
tgt: These sweet drinks not only can neutralize the sour taste, bring pleasure to people visually, but also can dilute the taste of wine and change the overall taste.
hypo: These sweet drinks, besides being able to harmonize with sour flavors, can also bring visual pleasure when added to drinks, and can change the taste of the beverage.

src: 红牌威士忌+切片柠檬+方糖(砂糖亦可),是最正宗、最传统的喝法.
tgt: Red Label whisky + sliced lemon + cube sugar (granulated sugar is also acceptable) is the most authentic and traditional drinking method.
hypo: Lemon slices, granulated sugar is the most traditional way to drink.

src: 正宗的红方威味道有些酸涩,加入糖可以中和其中的酸味,柠檬则会给酒带来清新的香味,当然,甜酸度可根据个人的口味爱好调配。
tgt: Authentic Red Label whisky tastes a little sour; adding sugar can neutralize the sour taste, lemon will bring fresh fragrance to the wine, and of course, the sweetness and sourness can be adjusted according to personal tastes.
hypo: Personal tastes may vary, but adding sugar can bring out the sweetness of the wine, giving it a refreshing flavor.

src: 以上三种都是红牌威士忌的最好喝法，大家可以作为参考尝试下，希望小编的介绍可以帮助到大家。
tgt: The above are the best drinking methods of Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky for your refence, and I hope my introduction can help you.
hypo: The three best methods for drinking sake are described below, and we hope this introduction can help you.

src: 金夫人婚纱摄影(南街店) 暂时还没有分店
tgt: Mrs. Gold Wedding Dress Photography (Nanjie Store) has no branch store yet.
hypo: The English translation for this sentence is: "Nanjie Store hasn't split into branches yet."

src: 拍照之前因为我们时间没安排好，更换了两次时间，顾问兰兰很耐心地帮我们安排了时间。
tgt: Because I didn’t arrange my time well before the shoot, I rescheduled twice and consultant Lanlan patiently arranged time for us.
hypo: Lanlan patiently consulted with us to arrange the time.

src: 后来选择了一个天气好的周末拍的。
tgt: Later we chose a weekend with nice weather to shoot it.
hypo: He chose a nice weekend to take pictures.

src: 金夫人的工作人员，无论是顾问，化妆师还是摄影师都超赞的。
tgt: The staff at Mrs. Gold, no matter it’s consultant or makeup artist, are fantastic.
hypo: The staff at the spa or salon, regardless of whether they are a consultant, beautician or photographer, are all highly praised.

src: 那是我生平第一次正式地化妆，哇～简直不敢相信，我有一天也会变得那么好看，哈哈。
tgt: That was the first time that I had officially put on makeup and wow, I couldn’t even believe that I could be so pretty one day, haha.
hypo: That is my first time properly dressing up, I'm not sure if I can look that good, haha.

src: 晓洁和另一个妹子（抱歉我记不得名字了）化妆超级有耐心，化妆也很自然。
tgt: Xiaojie and the other girl (sorry, I forgot her name) were super patient while doing my makeup and the makeup was natural.
hypo: Xiaojie and her sister (sorry, I can't remember her name) have superb makeup skills and makeup is very natural.

src: 外景在江湾城拍的，幸亏那天天气很好，没有觉得很冷，拍照的时候，化妆师时不时地留意我们的衣服，头饰，稍微有一点不好了就马上帮我们整理。
tgt: We shot the outdoor scene at Jiangwancheng, and fortunately the weather was nice that day, we didn’t feel cold; during the shoot, makeup artist was paying attention to our clothes, headwear, and made adjustment immediately once there was a problem.
hypo: The weather was very good that day, and it didn't feel too cold when we were taking the photos. Unfortunately, the makeup artist didn't pay attention to our clothing and accessories, and made some minor adjustments that needed to be done immediately.

src: 摄影师也非常幽默，拍照一天下来都觉得很开心。
tgt: The photographer was funny, and we were happy throughout the day.
hypo: The photographer was very quiet, and shooting one day made me feel very happy.

src: 在选照片的时候，因为在网上看到很多案例，不愿意让客人删太多照片，但是我们选照片的时候，真的，一点没有让我们加照片的意思，直接套餐里的24张，一张都没有加（听说和我差不多时间拍婚纱照的表妹，七千多的套餐还加了一万多的照片，当时我就惊呆了，心里也很怕自己会选太多）
tgt: When choosing the photos, I saw many cases online where they wouldn’t let the customers delete too many photos, but they didn’t ask us to add photos at all, just the 24 photos in the set and nothing more (I heard that my cousin who was also taking wedding dress photos added photos worth over 10,000 in addition to the 7,000 yuan set, and I was stunned and feared I might choose too many).
hypo: When choosing photos for our wedding, we saw a lot of examples online and didn't want to delete too many, but in the end, we only chose 24 photos, one of which didn't have a wedding dress. We heard that the 7,000-photo package also included a million photos with the bride and groom, but when we saw them, we were shocked and scared that we had chosen too many.

src: 今天照片修好了，兰兰发给我，我看了有两张觉得不太好，他们立刻就帮我重新修了。
tgt: The editing was finished today and Lanlan sent it to me; I felt two were not good enough and they immediately re-edited them for me.
hypo: They immediately sent Lanlan two pictures, and I didn't like them. They helped me to re-edit them.

src: 把妹妹以前拍的照片翻出来对比，我觉得我们的照片我真的太满意了，简约清新，就是我想要的风格。
tgt: I found the old photos of my sister to make comparison, and I felt that our photos were really satisfying, simple and fresh, exactly what I wanted.
hypo: I found our photos really satisfying, they were clear and fresh, exactly what I wanted.

src: 足浴盆泡脚发麻是漏电了吗？
tgt: Does it mean there is leakage of electricity if my feet feel numb in the feet bath basin?
hypo: Is there a leakage of electricity from your feet bath?

src: 选择合适的的足浴盆可以起到很好的足疗保健作用，今天国美小编将针对这个问题做出解答，希望对朋友们有所帮助。
tgt: Choosing the right feet bath basin can provide good pedicure and healthcare, and today Gome will answer this question; hopefully it will be helpful to you.
hypo: Choosing a suitable bath basin can have very good health benefits, and the US editors have provided helpful answers to this issue, hoping to be of assistance to friends.

src: 随着人们保健意识的增强，足浴盆越来越受到消费者的喜爱，在市场上也涌现出一大批档次不同的产品，从一百多元到上千元的足浴盆琳琅满目，给了消费者很大的选择空间。
tgt: As people care more about healthcare, feet bath basin has become more popular among the customers, and a large batch of products of different levels have emerged on the market, from a little more than 100 yuan up to a thousand yuan, giving the customers a lot of options.
hypo: As people's health awareness increases, more and more different products are presented in the market, ranging from a hundred yuan to thousands of yuan. This provides consumers with a great selection space.

src: 在相关的数据表面，与传统家电相比，足浴盆等保健类家电销售火爆，但足浴盆并没有专门行业标准，因此存在一定的安全隐患。
tgt: According to related statistics, compared with traditional home appliances, the sales of healthcare products such as feet bath basin was hot, but there is no specialized industry standard for feet bath basin and so there is potential safety risk.
hypo: In comparison to traditional home appliances, the sale of health-oriented home appliances such as saunas and hot tubs is booming, but these products lack industry standards, resulting in a certain safety risk.

src: “在带电的水里泡脚，实在太危险了吧!”
tgt: “Having a feet bath in the water with electricity is too dangerous!”
hypo: Having a bath in water is really dangerous!

src: 李先生告诉记者，近日，他买了一个足浴盆送给父亲做生日礼物，可是父亲泡脚时却感觉脚底发麻。
tgt: Mr. Li told reporter that he recently bought a feet bath basin for his father as a birthday present, but his father felt that the bottom of his feet were numb when using it.
hypo: Mr. Li told the reporter that he had recently bought a foot bath as a gift for his father, but his father's feet were numb when he tried to give it to him as a present.

src: 李先生一开始以为是足浴盆的振动功能引起的，没想到关了振动功能，父亲还是感觉到脚底麻麻的。
tgt: Mr. Li first thought it was caused by the vibration function of the feet bath basin, and it was unexpected that his father still felt his feet were numb after turning off the vibration function.
hypo: When Mr. Li began to use the vibration function of the massage chair, he was surprised to find that his feet and legs felt numb. His father, however, seemed to enjoy the sensation of the vibrations.

src: 李先生用电笔一试，电笔居然亮了，李先生惊讶地发现足浴盆的水里居然带电。
tgt: Mr. Li used a tester and the light on it was on; it was to Mr. Li’s surprise that the water in the feet bath basin was electrified.
hypo: Mr. Li was astonished to discover that the water in the bathtub was electrified.

src: 后来他联络了商家，商家的态度还不错，尽管退掉了足浴盆，李先生依然感到不快。
tgt: Then he contacted the seller, whose attitude was nice, but Mr. Li still felt upset although he had returned it.
hypo: After he had returned, the merchant's attitude was still good, even though he had retired his bath tub. Mr. Li still felt uneasy.

src: 因为他发现这个已经流行已久的足浴盆如今在最高温度的设定、适用于何种人群、何种材料保证无害等方面都没有一个明确详细的行业规定。
tgt: Because he found that feet bath basin, which has been popular for a long time, still has no explicit and detailed industry regulations on the setting of the maximum temperature, suitable crowd, what materials are safe to use, etc.
hypo: Because he discovered that the popular swimming pool is now set at the highest temperature, suitable for all kinds of people and materials, without any clear industry regulations.

src: 但是一般情况下足浴盆是不会有带电问题的，但也不排除少数产品在出厂时没有严格把关。
tgt: But normally feet bath basin shouldn’t be electrified, however we can’t rule out the fact that a few products might not have been strictly checked before leaving the factory.
hypo: But normally, showers without electricity are not a problem, but some products may have minor issues at the factory.

src: 因此在在购买的时候选择分体式的足浴盆。
tgt: Therefore, choose split type feet bath basin.
hypo: Therefore, when purchasing a bathroom sink, choose a split bath basin.

src: 水电分离，没有任何安全隐患。
tgt: There is no safety risk when water and electricity are separated.
hypo: Separating water and electricity is dangerous.

src: 同时你可以随便拿电笔测。
tgt: Meanwhile, you can use a tester to test it.
hypo: You can take the test whenever you want.

src: 羊行屮（chè），本名姜波，生于羊年羊月，羊行草上，适得其所，是为羊行屮，人称“羊叔”。
tgt: Yang Xingche, real name Jiang Bo, was born in the month of the sheep in the year of the sheep; the name Yang Xingche means the sheep feel most comfortable when they are on grass; people call him Uncle Yang (Sheep in Chinese).
hypo: The sheep, Jiang Bo, was born in the Year of the Sheep and was raised on the grassland. He is known as "Grandpa Sheep" among people.

src: 因出版“异域密码”系列的《泰国异闻录》《印度异闻录》《日本异闻录》《韩国异闻录》等作品，在业内有“悬疑怪才”之称，自称“擅长一本正经地胡说八道”

hypo: Stories in the "Strange Password" series, such as "Thai Strange News", "Indian Strange News", "Japanese Strange News" and "Korean Strange News" have earned the title of "Mystery Investigator" and are known for their in-depth exploration of the unknown.

src: 《灯下黑》，又名《中国异闻录》，“悬疑怪才”羊行屮用全新作品《灯下黑》带你深入领略中国民俗的骨髓，那些流传至今的传说，背后有怎样凄美、动人的爱恨绝唱？

src: 微流控芯片上盖板为PC材质，请勿通入与PC发生化学反应的溶剂。
tgt: The upper cover plate of the micro-fluid chip is made from PC material, and please do not add any solvent which could have chemical reaction with PC.
hypo: The PC material on the chip should not come into contact with any chemical reagents.

src: 请勿使用手推注射器直接对芯片进行进样，否则容易发生漏液。
tgt: Don’t inject sample into the chip directly with the hand syringe, or there may be liquid leakage.
hypo: Do not use a needle to inject the sample directly into the chip, as this may cause contamination.

src: 普通基底的微流控芯片发货前均在500mbar（100um沟道深度）或300mbar（50um沟道深度）进样压力下通过纯水测试。
tgt: The micro-fluid chips with ordinary base have passed the pure water test with the sample injection pressure of 500mbar (100um channel depth) or 300mbar (50um channel depth) before delivery.
hypo: The pressure before delivery is usually 500 mbar (100 um channel depth) or 300 mbar (50 um channel depth) by pure water testing.

src: 玻璃基底的芯片在发货前均在800mbar（100um沟道）进样压力下通过纯水测试，您在使用玻璃基底芯片过程中请注意不要与尖锐物体碰撞，否则会损坏基底。
tgt: The micro-fluid chips of glass base have passed the pure water test with the sample injection pressure of 800mbar (100um channel) before delivery; please avoid collision with sharp articles when using glass-base chips, which may lead to damage to the base.
hypo: Chips of glass base may lead to breakage during use.

src: 使用过程中请结合溶液粘稠度考虑并勿超出此范围，否则会引起漏液。
tgt: Please take the viscosity of the solution into consideration during usage and do not exceed the range, or it will lead to liquid leakage.
hypo: Take into consideration the viscosity of the solution and avoid exceeding this range, otherwise it will cause liquid leakage.

src: 普通基底的微流控微芯片在注射泵使用纯水进样的条件下，我们给您的建议流速设置在150ul/min以下，油相流速建议设置在50ul/min以下。
tgt: In condition of sample injection with pure water for micro-fluid chips of ordinary base, you are recommended to set the flow velocity as under 150ul/min and set the flow velocity of oil phase as under 50ul/min.
hypo: We recommend that the flow velocity should be set to 150ul/min or below, and the oil flow velocity should be set to 50ul/min or below.

src: 请根据实际进样液体的粘稠度综合考虑，由慢到快增加您的流速参数值。
tgt: Please take the viscosity of sample injection liquid into consideration, and increase your parameters of flow velocity from slowly to rapidly.
hypo: Take into consideration the viscosity of the actual sample fluid when increasing your flow rate parameter value gradually from slow to fast.

src: 通用芯片在实验完成后，请及时将内部沟道清洗干净，否则容易造成堵塞。
tgt: After completing the experiment, please clean the internal channel of the chips in time, or it may lead to blocking.
hypo: After the experiment is completed, please clean the internal channels promptly to avoid clogging.

src: 微流控芯片属于易耗品，不能长期重复使用。
tgt: As consumables, micro-fluid chips cannot be used repeatedly for long.
hypo: Microfluidic chips are consumable items and should not be reused for extended periods of time.

src: 如果由于长期使用或者不正当操作造成芯片的损坏不予退换。

src: 如果您需要可承受更大压力或者流速的微流控芯片，可联系客服定制。
tgt: Please contact the customer service staff for customization if you need micro-fluid chips that can bear larger pressure or with bigger flow velocity.

src: 尊敬的顾客您好，感谢您能够选择支雲餐厅用餐，因为菜品的问题给您带来不愉快的用餐体验我们深感歉意，我们已与厨房对接沟通对菜品进行严格把控，同事感谢您对我们的理解与支持，我是支雲餐厅小雲，期待与您再此相遇！

src: 大美360集成家装
tgt: Damei 360 Integrated Home Decoration
hypo: Damei Decoration

src: 地 址：环城南路156号幸福家园12楼
tgt: Address: Happy Home Building 12, South Ring Road 156
hypo: Address: 156 Huancheng South Road, Happy Family 12th Floor

src: 一开始是朋友介绍的因为信任，所以选择来看一下起初我的预算是7万做个基本装修。
tgt: I trusted it because my friend made the recommendation, so I chose to check it out, and originally my budget for a basic decoration was 70,000.
hypo: I trusted my friend, so I chose to take a look at his basic setup for $7,000.

src: 来到店里就开始一系列的骗术。
tgt: A series of scam began as soon as I came into the store.
hypo: When you enter the store, you will be subject to a series of scams.

src: 我是第一次到店只是给他们看了我的户型图，他们并没有去实地量过房子，他们居然就能给我报价说我的135的房子7万是可以搞定的，大概的给我看了一下他们的材料也并不知道他们是什么品牌的材料。
tgt: When I first came to the store, I showed them my floor plan; although they didn’t really go to my apartment to take the measurement, they said they could do it within 70,000 for my 135 square meters apartment, and they showed me their materials whose brand was unclear.
hypo: When I first came to the store, I showed them my floor plan. They didn't go to the site to measure the house, but they still gave me an approximate price of 135,000 RMB, which is within my budget. They also didn't know what brand of materials I was looking for.

src: 他们的第二套骗术就是你只要到店就会拖着你把定金交了（而这个钱一旦交了你是永远退不出来，除非你有足够的经历和他们打理论战）。
tgt: The second scam was forcing you to pay the deposit, which cannot be refunded once paid, unless you have enough experience to reason with them.
hypo: Their second scam is that once you go to the store, they will tow your car away unless you have enough experience and negotiating skills.

src: 我在犹豫要不要交定金的时候，他们就会邀请他们所谓的经理来告诉你，你今天只要把定金交了我们就能给你多少的优惠。
tgt: As I hesitated about whether to pay the deposit, they would invite their so-called manager to tell me that once I paid the deposit on that day, they could give me certain discount.
hypo: When it comes to depositing money, they will invite their manager to tell you how much discount you can get.

src: 这个就是一个大坑，我就是活生生被骗的例子，在头脑冲动的时候，交了一万多的定金。
tgt: This is a big swindle, and I was a victim who paid a deposit of more than 10,000 when I didn’t really think it through.
hypo: I was really thinking I was a victim of a scam when my head was moving.

src: 他给我的报价有很多问题7万不包括水电改造，不包括任何门和橱柜 浴室，而这三个就是基装的费用大头。
tgt: Their quoted price had a lot of problems; for instance, the 70,000 didn’t include water and electricity renovation, doors, cabinets or bathrooms, and these three take up a large proportion of the cost of basic installation.
hypo: The quoted price does not include water, electricity and furniture, which are the cost of the base.

src: 除去这些他们的服务点费收的也比其他家公司的高。
tgt: Apart from these, their service point fee is also higher than that of other companies.
hypo: They charge less for their services than other companies do.

src: 我对这个公司失去了信任，一开始什么都没有讲清楚就让我签合同。
tgt: I’ve lost trust in this company, because they asked me to sign the contract when they didn’t explain anything clearly.
hypo: They didn't trust me at first, so they didn't tell me what to sign.

src: 当我去找他们退钱的时候他们表现出很有经验的样子，有专门的小团队来对付你。
tgt: When I went to ask for a refund, they acted rather experienced and sent a small team to deal with me.
hypo: When I asked them to deal with you, they displayed a very experienced attitude with a special team ready to face you.

src: 无论如何都会一口咬死是客户的问题他们全然无责。
tgt: Anyway, they just said it was the client’s problem and they had absolutely no responsibility for it.
hypo: Regardless of how they might bite their death is the customer's problem and they are entirely responsible.

src: 各种推卸责任，还有很多细节，不想一一说了都是泪，总之不要选择他们，因为我朋友找他们装修的房子也是质量不好，后期给你算各种费用。
tgt: They just shrunk their responsibility in any way possible, and there were a lot more details that I don’t want to mention now; all in all, do not choose them because my friend had them renovate her apartment, and the quality was poor and they would charge you all kinds of other costs in the later stage.
hypo: My friend's apartment was of poor quality, and there were many details that I didn't want to deal with. I didn't want to choose them because the costs were too high.

src: 坑爹，他们就是原来骗人的龙头装饰，现在改成大美，好像又倒闭了又改成其他的。
tgt: Swindle; they used to be the swindler company Longtou Renovation, then it’s changed to Damei, and now it seems they have closed down and changed into something else.
hypo: It seems like they have changed the Longtou Renovation into something else.

src: 所以大家别选择这样坑爹的装修公司。
tgt: So please don’t choose such a swindler company.
hypo: Make sure to choose a reputable company.

src: 以后大家在选择的时候多百度看看这些查一下这些咨询因为装修不是小钱。
tgt: When you choose renovation companies in the future, please search them on Baidu because renovation cost is not a small amount.
hypo: When you choose, make sure to check these things out because renovation is not cheap.

src: 想要向商家提问，请先登录或注册
tgt: If you want to ask the merchant a question, please log in or register first.
hypo: I want to ask the merchant, please login or register first.

src: 严禁发布各种形式的商家点评，详细请见商户收录声明

hypo: Merchant Inclusion is not allowed to publish any kind of reviews, please refer to the merchant's declaration.

src: 大众点评昆明装修设计频道为您提供大美360集成家装地址，电话，营业时间等最新商户信息，找装修公司装修公司，就上大众点评
tgt: Dianping Kunming Renovation and Design Channel will provide you with the address, phone number, operation time and other information of Damei 360 Integrated Home Renovation, and please come to Dianping if you are looking for a renovation company.
hypo: Dianping If you are looking for renovation companies in Kunming, come to Dianping for the latest information on renovation companies, phone numbers, business hours, and more.

hypo: Before I went to the store, I saw the photos taken by the photographer. There were more outdoor wedding photos, and they were very beautiful. The photography style involved was also diverse.

src: 当天到了之后和小姐姐简单交流了自己的想法，非常耐心地帮我试了两套我纠结的风格衣服，最终敲定开始化妆造型~摄影师拍摄之前会摆一些道具，会指导动作，对各个细节也比较精益求精。
tgt: After I arrived that day, I communicated my own ideas with the young lady and she patiently helped me try on two outfits I was having trouble deciding and I made the final decision before starting styling and makeup~ the photographer would place some props and guide me to pose before the shoot, and was very attentive to the details.
hypo: The photographer patiently helped me with my makeup, and I was very grateful for their meticulous attention to detail.

src: 但是可能因为没和我交流具体的拍摄想法，所以拍出来的不是我想要的风格，但是应该是好看的🙊🙊
tgt: However, the photos taken were not in the style I wanted, perhaps it was because they didn’t communicate with me about the specific shooting ideas, but the photos should look nice🙊🙊
hypo: Perhaps it is because I lack specific shooting ideas, so the result is not what I want, but it should be good-looking.

src: 拍好之后摄影师会帮忙挑选照片，交流后期风格，感觉挺细心的叭。
tgt: After the shoot, the photographer would help pick the photos, communicate about post-editing style, and I think it was very thoughtful.
hypo: The photographer would help post-edit the photos and choose a style that feels thoughtful.

src: 修好的片大约要半个月，坐等效果~
tgt: It will take about half a month to edit all the photos and I look forward to seeing them~
hypo: It will take about half a month to see the effects of the edits.

src: 第二次中了写真类的霸王餐活动～全场大部分的衣服能够选择一件拍摄。
tgt: This is the second time that I have won the chance to experience a photoshoot for free~ you may choose one from most of the available outfits to do the photoshoot.
hypo: The photoshoot was a blast! Everyone got to choose one outfit to be photographed in.

src: 最后选择了一件黑色的纱裙，体验下不同的风格。
tgt: Eventually, I chose a black veil skirt so as to experience a different style.
hypo: He chose a black suit to experience a different style.

src: 整个拍摄过程要2个小时左右，化妆+拍摄，负责拍摄的摄影师是95后的弟弟呢，感觉稍微还是有点青涩，希望在顾客拍摄动作指导方面以后能给更多的建议呀～挺健谈的，拍摄过程比较愉快。
tgt: The entire photoshoot took about 2 hours including the makeup and shoot; the photographer was a young guy born after 1995, who seemed to be a little shy; I hope he could give more advice to clients in terms of poses~ he was talkative and the shoot was pleasant.
hypo: The whole shooting process took about two hours, including makeup and shooting. The photographer was my brother's friend, who was talkative and seemed a bit inexperienced. I hope he can give more advice in the future and make the shooting process more enjoyable.

src: 文摄视觉美学摄影馆优选品质店 回复
tgt: Wenshe Visual Aesthetics Photography Studio Premium Store reply
hypo: The Visual Aesthetics Photography Store is the best choice for premium products.

src: 上首页了，也来看看Queenie吧~
tgt: It is on the front page, come and see Queenie~
hypo: I went to the homepage and also came to check out Queenie~

src: 到店先填了姓名电话然后选服装，婚纱都可以选，换了三四套服装还蛮耐心的，选好后化妆化了很久，服务态度也好，后面拍摄会教你怎么摆造型，就是拍出来的感觉脸好大，精修说是要半个月，三四天就发来了，感觉好像跟原片没啥差别
tgt: After I arrived at the store, I filled in my name and chose the outfits; all the wedding dresses were available to be chosen; I tried on three or four outfits and they were quite patient; after I decided on the dress, they were doing my makeup for a long time and they were also nice during this time; later in the shoot, they would teach you how to pose; I felt my face was too big on the photo; they said detailed editing would take a month, but they sent them to me after three to four days, and they seemed not that different from the original photos.
hypo: They sent me three or four outfits and they were very patient with me while I was trying them on. The service was great and the makeup was done very professionally. Afterwards, the photographer taught me how to pose and it felt like the result was worth the wait, which was about half a month. I received the photos three or four days later and it seemed like they were identical to the original ones.

src: 【环境】整体还好。
tgt: [Environment] It was not bad overall.
hypo: The environment is still good.

src: 可选衣服很多。
tgt: There are a lot of outfits to choose from.
hypo: There are many choices of clothing.

src: 化妆位置差不多有三个，里边是摄影棚。
tgt: There are about three seats for doing makeup and the studio is inside.
hypo: There are three seats available, with a photography backdrop nearby.

src: 【服务】很热情，也很细心。
tgt: [Service] Very enthusiastic and attentive to details.
hypo: The service was very enthusiastic and attentive to details.

src: 造型师挺有耐心的。
tgt: The stylist was patient.
hypo: The teacher is very patient.

src: 摄影师也会很认真教你动作。
tgt: Photographer would patiently teach you to pose.
hypo: The photographer would patiently teach you the proper actions.

src: 不满意，摄影师也会主动提出补拍。
tgt: If you are not satisfied, the photographer would propose to take it again.
hypo: The photographer will propose to retouch the photo.

src: 【体验】可能造型有点过了，原本双眼皮被贴出了三眼皮。
tgt: [Experience] Maybe the style was a little too much, double eyelids turned into triple eyelids.
hypo: Experience has changed somewhat, the original double eyelids have been replaced with triple eyelids.

src: 眉尾也被剃了，对于日常不画眉的有点尴尬。
tgt: The tail of my eyebrow got shaved, and it was a little awkward for those who don’t wear makeup normally.
hypo: My eyebrow got shaved, which makes everyday life a bit awkward.

src: 照片十来天给了，但是P图效果不怎么满意，感觉双眼皮贴那些还是很明显。
tgt: The photos were sent to me after about ten days, but I was not very satisfied with the photoshop effect, and I feel that the double eyelids tapes are still obvious.
hypo: The photo gave double eyelids, but the effect was not satisfactory; it felt too obvious.

src: 因为不太清楚要什么风格 试了两套 结果挑来挑去 还是选了黑色礼服 小姐姐说这套是比较赫本复古风
tgt: I tried on two outfits because I didn’t know what style to choose, and I ended up choosing the black suit after trying hesitating; the young lady said it was a vintage Audrey Hepburn style.
hypo: I ended up choosing the black dress.

src: 选好衣服后就开始弄妆发啦 发型师和化妆师小姐姐都超级耐心在帮我弄 弄出来的效果非常满意
tgt: After choosing the outfit, we began with the hair and makeup; the hair stylist and makeup artist were super patient and I was really satisfied.
hypo: After I chose my outfit, the hairstylist and makeup artist worked hard to achieve the perfect look. I was very satisfied with the outcome.

src: 弄好妆发后就开始拍照了 摄影师全程都有指挥我摆姿势 过程很轻松和谐
tgt: The photoshoot started after finishing makeup and hair, and the photographer guided me to pose the whole time; the process was relaxed and harmonious.
hypo: After finishing getting ready, the photographer took the pictures in a relaxed and harmonious manner.

src: 拍完后认真选了四张最喜欢的当精修 小哥哥说15内成片 结局非常心满意足～
tgt: After the photoshoot, I chose my four favorite ones to be retouched, and the guy said the photos would be completed within 15 days and I was really satisfied with the results~
hypo: After he had finished watching the movie, his younger brother said he had picked four of his favorite scenes and was very satisfied with the ending.

src: 1、【酒厂直营】宁城八里罕老窖 42度500ML 浓香型高粱原浆白酒 口感绵柔老酒 整箱四瓶

src: 推荐理由:精选高粱为原料，采用传统工艺酿造，来自内蒙古高原的白酒，口感更为经典，浓香甜口，涩中带点甜，层次丰富，采用传统固态法白酒工艺，保留了其原汁原味不流失，让酒体带着浓郁又醇厚的口感。
tgt: Recommendation: Made from carefully selected sorghum, brewed using traditional procedure; baijiu from Inter Mongolian Plateau tastes more classic, rich, sweet, astringent and layered; it adopts traditional solid-state Baijiu procedure to keep its original flavor, giving it a rich and mellow taste.
hypo: Recommendation: Selecting high-quality raw materials, employing traditional craftsmanship to produce baijiu from the Inner Mongolian Plateau, the flavor is classic, rich in aroma, sweet in the mouth, and layered. Traditional solid-state fermentation is employed to retain the original flavor and aroma of the liquor, leaving a rich and robust taste.

src: 该款等级1，容量500，存储方法常温、阴凉、干燥通风处，包装其它，酒精度42，香型浓香型，省份内蒙古，产品重量（kg）2.9， 目前已有4人评价 ，获得了100%的好评率。
tgt: This one is on level 1 with 500ml; storage method: normal temperature, in a cool, dry and ventilated place; packaging: other; alcohol: 42 degrees; flavor type: rich flavor; province: Inner Mongolia; product weight (kg): 2.9; at present, 4 people have reviewed it with 100% positive comments.
hypo: This item is level 1, capacity 500, stored in a cool, dry place, packaged other, fragrance intensity 42, region Inner Mongolia, product weight (kg) 2.9, and has been rated by 4 people with a 100% positive rating.

hypo: Stored Grain Baijiu is stored in a big jar at 52 degrees.

src: 推荐理由:经过多年窖藏，就为更浓，更透澈，是内蒙古大草原游牧民族爱喝的酒，浓香形秉承了传统酿造工艺，陶醉了华夏质朴亲切，适合各类宴席或者居家使用的一款白酒。
tgt: Recommendation: After beings stored in the cellar for many years, it is richer and clearer; it is what nomadic people in Inner Mongolia prairie like to drink; the rich flavor inherits the traditional brewing process, and is intoxicated with the simplicity and friendliness of the Chinese people; it is suitable for all kinds of banquets or drinking at home.
hypo: Recommended reason: After years of storage, it has become more concentrated, more fragrant, and has inherited the traditional craftsmanship of the Mongolian nomadic people. It is suitable for various occasions and everyday use.

src: 该款容量5000ml，包装坛装，产品重量（kg）8，香型浓香型，存储方法通风，省份内蒙古，等级一级，酒精度52， 目前已有50+人评价 ，获得了95%的好评率 。

hypo: This product has a capacity of 5000ml, is packed in a box, weighs 8kg, is fragrant and has been rated by 50+ people with a 95% positive rating. It stores well and is from Inner Mongolia.

src: 3、【酒厂直营】宁城八里罕老窖 42度500ML 浓香型高粱原浆白酒 口感绵柔老酒 整箱六瓶

src: 推荐理由:这款白酒精选高粱生态酿造，香味协调，入窖发酵，出酒陈化，酒的味道更香浓。

hypo: This baijiu is crafted through a special fermentation process that enhances its aroma and flavor. It is richer and more fragrant than other baijius.

src: 来自内蒙古高原的白酒，口感更为经典，浓香四溢的味道滑过宾客们的唇齿，让他们喝的尽兴。

hypo: The white liquor from the Inner Mongolian Plateau has a classic aroma and a flavorful aftertaste that lingers on the tongue of the guests, making them savor every sip.

src: 推荐理由:精选高粱，通过独特技艺的加工，让你在宴请欢聚，家庭小酌的时候，都能够开怀畅饮。

hypo: Recommendation: Selecting high-quality ingredients, through specialized craftsmanship, you can enjoy a memorable gathering with your family and friends, anytime.

src: 这儿家居家电比较齐全，品牌众多，知名品牌全。
tgt: Home appliances in this store are quite complete, with many brands including almost all well-known brands.
hypo: This place is very crowded, with many well-known brands.

src: 双十二那阵，到“汉斯顿”净水器店，看净水器，店内正在做活动，价格比较优惠。

hypo: The Double is going to the Hansen Water Filter Store to look at water filters, and the prices are comparatively cheap.

src: 居然之家一共11层，负二层到9层，负一负二都是停车的地方，而且白天停车免费!
tgt: There are 11 floors in Easyhome, from B2 to 9th floor, in which B2 and B2 are for parking and parking is free during the day!
hypo: Surprisingly, the parking lot has 11 levels, with level 2 being the lowest and level 1 being the highest. Furthermore, parking is free during the day!

src: 周围是真不怎样，饭店五金店寥寥无几，而且饭店味道一般般。
tgt: The surroundings are really not nice, with few restaurants and hardware store, and the food there tasted average.
hypo: The food was really bad, the restaurant was overpriced and the taste was average.

src: 这个电梯也是很无语，跟有那大病一样，负二到负一，来回折腾，不停我按的这一层，从安全通道下去到一楼，也是很无语，直接通到一个家具店，家具店关门，安全通道出不去!
tgt: This elevator really makes people speechless; it went back and forth from B2 to B1 and did not stop on my floor, and it was ridiculous that when I went to the 1st floor from fire escape, it led to a furniture store which was closed, so I couldn’t get out from the fire escape, either!
hypo: This elevator is really strange. It's just like that big illness, going down two steps and then going up one, from the safe passageway to the first floor, it's also really strange, directly going to a furniture store, the furniture store closes, there's no way out!

src: 居然之家还是需要提升，有很多地方都没有开发。
tgt: Easyhome still needs to be improved with a lot of spaces to be developed.
hypo: Surprisingly, there are still many places that have not been developed.

src: 地址：沙依巴克区高铁北一路555号，交通方便，停车场很大，白天还是免费的。
tgt: Address: HSR North One Road, Bayishake District, convenient transportation, big parking lot free during the day.
hypo: The address is 555 North 1st Avenue, Salt Lake City. Convenient transportation is available, and there is a large parking lot, which is free both day and night.

src: 环境：说实话店里面积大，有8～9层，家里想买的家具、家用电器、各种小东西……，都能买到，好多名牌商家都入驻在店里，慕思、欧派、华帝、老板、峰创之家、汉斯顿、雅克、友邦、丝涟、富品居、万家乐、大自然、中联、美的、雅丹……，品牌真的是太多了，我只能记得这么多了，是购买产品的好去处，逛累了可以坐在沙发上休息休息哦。
tgt: Environment: Honestly, the store is large with 8-9 floors, where you can buy all the furniture, household appliances and small things your home needs, and many famous brands have settled in the store, such as DeRUCCI, OPPEIN, VATTI, Robam, Fengchuang Home, Hunsdon, Yake, AIA, Sealy, Fupinju, GUANGDONG MACRO, Nature, Zoomlion, Midea, Yadan, and so many other brands, I can only remember so many; it is a good place to buy products, and you can sit on the couch and have a rest if you get tired.
hypo: I can't remember all the brands that are in the store, but there are many popular ones such as H&M, Zara, Topshop, Marks & Spencer, Gucci, Dior, Chanel, Hermes, Adidas, Nike, and many more. It's a great place to buy products and rest if you're tired.

src: 最近想买一套舒适的沙发，朋友说这里有好多沙发可以选，看了顾家家居、美克美家的，感觉还可以，就是价格略贵，所以还在纠结中
tgt: I recently want to buy a couch and my friend said there was a lot of couch to choose from here; I looked at Kuka Home and Markor Furnishings, and I felt they were okay but a little expensive, so I am still struggling to decide.
hypo: I'm still making up my mind between the couches I saw at my friend's place and the ones at the furniture store. They're both reasonably priced, so I'm still weighing my options.

src: 大众点评乌鲁木齐家居卖场频道为您提供高铁居然之家地址，电话，营业时间等最新商户信息，找装修公司，就上大众点评

tgt: Students played the leading role at the Annual Academic Conference of Zhejiang University with creative research achievements - Xinhuanet
hypo: The English translation for this sentence is: "The results of the research presented at the University of Zhejiang's annual conference had people's brains spinning - XinhuaNet".

src: 用空气来洗手，哈口气判断疾病，精确搜寻雾霾来源 昨天晚上，在浙江大学2016年学术年会开幕式上，一系列脑洞大开的学术成果获得表彰。
tgt: Washing hands with air, diagnosing disease through breath, and accurately seeking for source of smog; last night, a series of creative academic achievements were awarded at the opening ceremony of the 2016 Annual Academic Conference of Zhejiang University.
hypo: Yesterday evening, at the 2016 Academic Conference of Zhejiang University, a series of groundbreaking scientific results were presented.

src: 这些成果的主要研究者都是学生，研究覆盖了环境、机械、能源、医疗、生命科学、人文教育等各大领域，同学们从一个好奇的点子开始，创造出了许多具有应用价值的高端发明，其中一些项目已在国内国际获奖。
tgt: The main researchers of these achievements are students, with research covering major fields of environment, machinery, energy, medicine, life science and humanities education; students created many high-end inventions with application values from a curious idea, and some of them have won awards at home and abroad.
hypo: These inventions were created by students from various fields of research, such as environment, machinery, energy, medicine, social science, and education. Some of these projects have already won awards both domestically and internationally.

src: 生物传感器：你的家庭体检医生
tgt: Biosensor: your home physical examination doctor
hypo: Your family doctor.

src: 生物医学工程学院博士生张迪鸣团队现场展示了一个智能手机端的生物传感器，大小只有智能手机的一半。
tgt: The team of Zhang Diming, a doctoral student of School of Biomedical Engineering, showed a biosensor on the smart phone with the size of only a half of a smart phone.
hypo: Zhang Diming, a team of biomedical engineering graduate students, demonstrated a smartphone-sized biometric sensor, half the size of a smartphone.

src: “你只需要轻轻呼一口气，这套仪器就能从你呼出的气体成分中，初步检测身体健康状况 。 ”
tgt: “All you need to do is to breathe out, and this set of instrument can detect your physical conditions preliminarily from the components of the air you breathe out.”
hypo: You just need to take a few breaths, and this instrument can detect your body's health conditions from the components of the breath you exhale.

src: 张迪鸣介绍说，这套传感器与智能手机相连，呼出气体后，健康报告就会显示在手机上。
tgt: Zhang Diming introduced, this set of sensor is connected to the smart phone; after you breathe out, the health report will be shown on your phone.
hypo: Zheng Dimei introduced that this sensor is connected to a smartphone, and after breathing in the air, a health report will be displayed on the phone.

src: 市场上能够检测健康状况的智能手环，一般检测的是温度、脉搏等物理参数。
tgt: Smart bands on the market which can detect health conditions often measure physical parameters such as temperature and pulse.
hypo: Smart rings can detect health conditions on the market, usually detecting temperature, heart rate and other physical parameters.

src: 而这套生物传感器运用了石墨烯这种新型材料，它的目标物是化学元素，敏锐的“嗅觉”让它能更深度、准确地体现身体健康状况。
tgt: This set of biological sensor uses the new material of graphene; its target is chemical elements, and its keen “sense of smell” enables it to reflect the health status of the body more in-depth and accurately.
hypo: This biometric sensor uses this new material, which is sensitive to chemical elements, allowing it to detect body health conditions more deeply and accurately.

src: 智能手术灯：医生的高能眼睛
tgt: Smart operation lamp: high-functioning eyes for doctors
hypo: Smart surgery light: doctors' high-powered eyes.

src: 除了智能手机，手术室里也用起了智能手术灯。
tgt: In addition to smart phones, smart operation lamps are now being used in operating rooms.
hypo: Besides smartphones, operating rooms are also using smart surgical lights.

src: 这项发明在今年第44届瑞士日内瓦国际发明展中获得银奖。
tgt: This invention has won the silver prize in the 44th International Exhibition of Inventions in Geneva, Switzerland this year.
hypo: This invention won a silver medal at the 44th Swiss International Invention Exhibition.

src: 光电科学与工程学院硕士生朱林靖、申俊飞团队在传统手术灯的缺陷中开启了新思路，发明了智能LED手术无影灯。
tgt: The team of Zhu Linjing and Shen Junfei, two graduate students from School of Optoelectronic Science and Engineering, developed a new idea trying to solve the defects of traditional operating lamps and invented the smart LED operation shadow-less lamp.
hypo: The team of master's students from the Institute of Optoelectronics and Engineering of University of Shenzhen, led by Zhu Lin and Sun Junfei, opened up a new idea and invented a smart shadow-less operation light.

src: “很多疾病早期检测、切除不到位，跟医生手术室用的灯有关 。 ”
tgt: “Improper early detection of many diseases and inaccurate excision are related to operation lamps used by doctors.”
hypo: Many diseases can be detected and removed in the early stages with the help of doctors.

src: 申俊飞说，比如癌症早期检查时，医生如果不能及时看清所有肿瘤组织，那么之后癌细胞还会扩散。
tgt: According to Shen Junfei, for example, in early inspection of cancer, if doctors cannot see clearly all the tumor tissues in a timely manner, the tumor cells will still spread.
hypo: If doctors cannot detect all tumor organizations in time during the early inspection of cancer, the cancer cells will spread afterwards.

src: 这种智能手术灯有四个灯盘，通过调节光谱，来增强不同组织在光照下的区别度。
tgt: This type of smart operation lamp has four lamp panels, which enhance the distinction degree of different tissues by adjusting the spectrum.
hypo: This smart surgical lamp has four lightbulbs, which can be adjusted to strengthen the differences between different organizations under the light.

src: 在手术过程中，医生可以根据手术需要和个人习惯，随时调节光斑的大小、光亮程度、光谱、颜色均匀性以及无影率。
tgt: During the operation process, doctors can adjust the size of light spot, brightness, spectrum, color uniformness and shadow-less degree any time according to demands of operation and personal habits.
hypo: During the surgical process, doctors can adjust the size, brightness, spectrum, color uniformity and transparency according to the patient's needs and personal habits.

src: 这种智能手术灯已经在浙江大学医学院附属邵逸夫医院、浙江大学医学院附属儿童医院等医院试用，得到较好的反馈。
tgt: This type of smart operating lamp has been tried in hospitals such as Sir Run Shaw Hospital Afflicted to Zhejiang University Medical College and the Children’s Hospital Affiliated to Zhejiang University Medical College, and received favorable feedback.
hypo: This kind of intelligent light has been tried at the affiliated hospitals of Zhejiang University, including Sir Run Children's Hospital, and has received good feedback.

src: 去年十月，这项发明获得国家挑战杯一等奖。
tgt: Last October, this invention won the first prize of the National Challenge Cup Competition.
hypo: In October, the invention won the national challenge cup.

src: 用空气洗手：省水又酷炫
tgt: Washing hands with air: save water in a cool way
hypo: Washing

src: 普通人洗手就是用水冲，顶多擦点肥皂，挤点洗手液，而李启章等同学则发明了一套“空气洗手装置 ” 。
tgt: Normally, people wash hands by flushing hands with water, with a little soap and sanitizer at most; however, Li Qizhang and his classmates invented a set of “equipment to wash hands with air”.
hypo: Qizhang and his classmates invented a set of "air washing device".

src: 只要站上装置的洗手台，我们的体重就能将空气压缩而出。
tgt: As long as we stand on the washbasin of the equipment, our weight can compress the air out.
hypo: As soon as we stand on the scales, our weight will be able to be compressed out of the air.

src: “就像是一个打气筒。
tgt: “Just like an inflator.
hypo: Just like an inflator.

src: 压缩出的空气，在水龙头处形成流体，和水结合在一起。
tgt: The air compressed out can form a flow at the faucet and combine with water.
hypo: The compressed air was combined with water at the faucet to form a fluid.

src: 这样，我们就能把手洗干净啦 ！ ”
tgt: As such, we can wash our hands clean!”
hypo: We can wash our hands clean!

src: 显色反应和细菌残留实验证明：通过这种方法洗手的效果，和普通的洗手方法是一样的。
tgt: Chromogenic reaction and germ residue experiment results prove that the effect of hand washing this way is the same as that of the ordinary method.
hypo: The chromogenic reaction proved that the effect of this method of washing is the same as the ordinary washing method.

src: 这个装置只需要依靠我们自身的重力作为驱动，既能保证洗净程度，又能节约90%的水，整个过程完全无能耗，节能环保。
tgt: This equipment is only driven by our weight, which can not only guarantee we wash our hands clean, but also save 90% of water; the entire process has no energy consumption and is energy-saving and environment-friendly.
hypo: This device only needs to rely on our own gravity as a source of power, able to ensure cleanliness as well as save up to 90% of water, making the whole process completely energy-efficient and eco-friendly.

src: 去年，在第二届全球重大挑战峰会中，这项发明在诸多世界顶尖名校中脱颖而出，获得唯一的金奖。
tgt: Last year, at the 2nd Global Grand Challenge Summit, this invention emerged among all the top universities in the world and was awarded with the only gold award.
hypo: Last year, this invention made a splash at the Second Global Challenge Cup, winning the exclusive prize in many top universities across the world.

src: 重庆中职学校试点现代学徒制 入学即是企业准员工-新华网
tgt: Modern apprenticeship system is tried in secondary vocational schools in Chongqing, and students are qualified employees-to-be after entrance - Xinhuanet
hypo: Chengdu Modern Vocational School Entrance Exam is like a corporate employee recruitment - Xinhua Net

src: 昨天，记者从市教委获悉，今年起，我市将在60所中职学校试点“现代学徒制”人才培养模式，接受试点培养的学生同时具备学徒身份，招生录入后将被试点企业预录为单位员工。
tgt: It was learned from the Municipal Commission of Education yesterday that our city will start to implement “modern apprenticeship system” in 60 secondary vocational schools from this year, and the students participating in the program have the identity of apprenticeship at the same time, who will be pre-recruited as employees of the experimental units after being enrolled.
hypo: Yesterday, the reporter found out from the city's education committee that our city will start a modern apprenticeship program in 60 vocational schools this year. Students accepted into the program will receive both classroom instruction and on-the-job training, and those who complete the program will be pre-hired by the companies as full-time employees.

src: 市教委要求，规范中职学校招生录取和企业用工程序，明确学徒的中职学校学生和企业准员工双重身份，按照双向选择原则，学徒、学校和企业签订三方协议，对于年满16周岁未达到18周岁的学徒，须由学徒、监护人、学校和企业四方签订协议，确定各方权益及学徒在岗培养的具体岗位、教学内容、权益保障等。
tgt: According to the requirements of the Municipal Commission of Education, it is necessary to standardize the enrollment procedure of secondary vocational schools and the enterprise employment procedure, specify the dual identities of the students as both students of secondary vocational schools and employees-to-be of enterprises; according to the two-way selection principle, three-party agreement shall be signed by apprentices, schools and enterprises; for apprentices from the age of 16 to 18 years old, four-party agreement shall be signed by apprentices, guardians, schools and enterprises, to determine the rights and interests of all parties as well as specific posts, teaching content, protection of rights and interests, etc.
hypo: The enrollment of secondary school students and company employees should be specific, dual-tracked, and based on the principle of mutual selection. For students aged 16 or above but under 18, a four-party agreement should be signed by the student, guardian, school, and company to determine the specific position, curriculum, and benefits.

src: 鼓励试点学校采用现代学徒制形式与合作企业联合开展企业员工岗前培训和转岗培训。
tgt: Experimental unit schools are encouraged to adopt the modern apprenticeship system and work with cooperative enterprises to carry out pre-job training and post-shift training for employees.
hypo: Enterprises should make use of modern teaching methods and collaborate with each other to provide employees with pre-shift and post-shift training.

src: 试点学校要改革人才培养模式。
tgt: Experimental unit schools shall carry out reform on talent cultivation model.
hypo: The school needs to reform its talent cultivation model.

src: 校企共同设计人才培养方案，共同制订专业教学标准、课程标准、岗位标准、企业师傅标准、质量监控标准及相应实施方案。
tgt: Experimental unit schools and enterprises shall work together to design talent training plan and jointly formulate professional teaching standard, curriculum standard, post standard, enterprise master standard, quality monitoring standard and corresponding implementation plan.
hypo: The school and company jointly design a talent cultivation plan, including the joint design of professional teaching standards, courses, qualification standards, enterprise teachers, and quality control standards and corresponding implementation plans.

src: 试点以培养学制为一个试点周期，学生在企业的实习时间根据专业人才培养方案确定，顶岗实习一般为6个月。
tgt: The experimental unit schools take each training program as a period for experiment, and the time of internship of students in enterprises shall be determined according to professional talent training plan; in-post internship is generally 6 months.
hypo: Generally, in enterprises, students will spend 6 months on internships.

src: 在企业实践应实施企业班组化管理模式，根据不同专业的特点，1个师傅可带2～5个徒弟，组成学习小组，确保学生熟练掌握每个轮训岗位所需的技能。
tgt: Enterprise working group management mode shall be implemented during enterprise practices; according to features of different majors, one master can teach 2 to 5 apprentices, and learning groups can be formed to ensure that students can master the skills required for each post of training in rotation.
hypo: Different students can be assigned to one master with 2 to 5 disciples, forming a learning group according to their respective skills.

src: 根据安排，从2016年起到2019年8月，我市分三批确定60个市级中职现代学徒制试点，每个试点人数在50人左右，总共培养3000名左右学生（学徒 ） 。
tgt: According to the arrangement, the 60 municipal modern apprenticeship system experimental units will be determined in three batches from 2016 to August, 2019, with about 50 apprentices in each experiment unit, and a total of around 3000 students (apprentices) will be trained.
hypo: According to the plan, from 2016 to 2019, our city decided to hold 60 modern-style apprenticeship tests, with each batch having around 50 students. In total, this will involve training 3000 students (apprentices).

src: 按照先试点再推行，由点到面逐步推进的原则，探索建立校企联合招生、联合培养、一体化育人的长效机制，切实提升学生岗位技能，提高学生对口就业率和就业质量。
tgt: According to the principle of experimental units first and implementation later, and gradual advancement from point to area, the long-term mechanism of joint recruitment by schools and enterprises, joint training and integrated training shall be explored and established, so as to fundamentally improve the job skills of students and improve the rate of employment fitting students’ major, as well as the quality of employment quality of students.
hypo: Schools should explore a unified recruitment, training and integration system to enhance students' capabilities and improve their employment rate and employment quality.

src: 中国儿童中心将举办系列活动让孩子“高科技”过“六一 ” - 新华网
tgt: China Children’s Center will hold a series of activities to let children celebrate “Children’s Day” with high technology – Xinhuanet
hypo: The Center will hold a series of activities to let children "high-tech" over "June 1".

src: 新华社北京５月２０日电（黄小希 周珊珊）记者２０日从中国儿童中心获悉，５月２８日至６月１日“六一”儿童节前后，中国儿童中心计划将举办儿童创客体验、儿童视觉艺术节、亲子书香嘉年华等一系列活动，让孩子们在前沿科技的魅力中度过“六一 ” 。
tgt: Message from Xinhua News Agency Beijing on May 20 (journalists: Huang Xiaoxi and Zhou Shanshan) According to China Children’s Center on May 20, from May 28 to June 1, before and on the “Children’s Day”, China Children’s Center will hold a series of activities such as Children as Makers, Children’s Visual Art Festival and the Carnival of Parent-Child Reading, to let children celebrate Children’s Day while immersing themselves in the charisma of cutting-edge technologies.
hypo: The China Children's Center will hold a series of activities, such as a children's creativity experience, a children's visual art show, and a parent-child reading carnival, to allow children to explore the charm of technology in the lead up to Children's Day.

src: 据了解，中国儿童中心今年“六一”儿童节期间举办的活动包括“爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华、首届儿童视觉艺术节 、 “ 书香嘉年华”活动 、 “ 全家爱阅读”绘本系列活动等。
tgt: It is understood that the activities held during the “Children’s Day” by China Children’s Center this year include the “Cool Maker Loves Family” carnival of children’s future learning, the first children’s visual art festival, the “Book Carnival” event and the “Whole Family Loves Reading” Picture Book Reading activity.
hypo: During the "Children's Day" period, the China Children's Center will be holding activities such as the "Crazy about the Future" Children's Festival, the first Children's Visual Arts Festival, the "Bookworm" Children's Carnival, and the "Reading Together" Children's Drawing Series.

src: 中国儿童中心副主任李忠明在２０日举行的２０１６年“六一”儿童节媒体通气会上介绍说 ， “ 爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华是今年中国儿童中心庆“六一”的重点活动。
tgt: According to the introduction from Li Zhongming, Deputy Director of China Children’s Center, at the 2016 “Children’s Day” media exchange meeting held on May 20, “Cool Maker Loves Family” carnival of children’s future learning is a key activity held by China Children’s Center for “Children’s Day”.
hypo: The "Love Cool" Children's Festival is this year's highlighted activity of the China Children's Center.

src: 活动着眼于将社会创新与家庭个人创意有机结合，通过儿童和家庭参与体验各种创新教育活动，让创新实践成为大众家庭的文化基因，让“动手做”成为广大家庭新的学习和生活方式。
tgt: The activity focuses on combining social innovation and family and personal creativity; the activity makes innovative practices a cultural gene of the public by letting children and their families experience various innovative and educational activities, to make “do-it-yourself” as a new way of learning and living of families.
hypo: Through children and family participation in various innovation education activities, let innovation become a culture of the family, and "hands-on" become a new way of learning and living for the whole family.

src: 据悉 ， “ 爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华包括“豆果创客”体验活动、老牛儿童探索馆周年庆暨“探索全家爱 童萌过六一”活动、ＶＲ全民体验计划 、 “ 创客部落”互动工作坊等几十项前沿科技体验内容。
tgt: It is understood that “Cool Maker Loves Family” carnival of children’s future learning includes dozens of leading scientific and technological experience such as the “Douguo Makers” experience activity, Old Cow children exploration house anniversary celebration and the “Exploring Love of the Whole Family, Celebrate the Children’s Day with Innocence” activity, VR Public Experience Plan and “Creator Tribe” interaction workshop.
hypo: According to what is known, the upcoming Children's Day celebration will include a variety of exciting activities such as the "Durian Experience" interactive museum, the "Explore the Whole Family" celebration and the "Discover Six One" interactive program, as well as many other cutting-edge technology experiences.

src: 南非医生：奥密克戎传播力虽强 但多为轻症
tgt: Doctors from South Africa: Although more transmissible, most of the patients infected by Omicron are mild cases
hypo: South African doctors: The power of the Xhosa oral tradition is strong, but it is not as effective for serious illnesses.

src: 南非许多医生和医疗专家认为，新冠病毒奥密克戎变种所致病症比德尔塔变种更为轻微，虽然传播速度更快。
tgt: Many doctors and medical experts in South Africa believe that patients infected by Omicron are milder cases compared with those infected by Delta, although Omicron is more transmissible.
hypo: Medical experts believe that Omicron variant cases are milder than Delta variant cases, although the transmission rate is faster.

src: 据美联社报道，随着奥密克戎变种在南非的传播，南非豪登省的一个五千多名医生组成医师组织报告说，他们目前治疗的新冠病人出现的症状都比较轻微，例如身体疼痛和咳嗽等与流感类似的症状。
tgt: According to report from the Associated Press, as Omicron is being transmitted in South Africa, a report by a physician organization composed by more than 5,000 doctors in Gauteng, South Africa says that most of the current patients of COVID-19 in treatment have mild symptoms, such as body ache and cough, which are similar to symptoms of flu.
hypo: According to a report from the Omicron branch of the World Health Organization, the spread of the virus in South Africa has resulted in a group of over 5,000 medical professionals from the province of KwaZulu-Natal to report that the symptoms of the infected patients are relatively mild, such as body aches, fever, and coughing.

src: 该组织总监安本·皮莱（Unben Pillay）医生说，他每天都要看几十名病人，但是还没有任何病人需要住院。
tgt: According to Doctor Unben Pillay, chief supervisor of the organization, he needs to provide medical services to dozens of patients every day, but none of them needs to be hospitalized.
hypo: The doctor in charge, Unben Pillay, said that he has to see around ten patients a day, but there are still no patients needing hospitalization.

src: 皮莱说 ： “ 他们能够在家里控制疾病，大多数人在隔离10至14天内康复 。 ”
tgt: Pillay said, “Their diseases can be controlled at home, and most of them can recover after quarantine of 10 to 14 days.”
hypo: Pillay said, "They can usually recover within 10 to 14 days."

src: 他说，这包括老年患者和那些有健康问题的患者，这些人群本来更容易因冠状病毒感染而陷入重症。
tgt: He said that those included aged patients and patients with health problems, who were easier to become severe cases due to infection of the COVID-19.
hypo: He said, "This includes elderly patients and those with health problems, who are more likely to get worse due to coronavirus infections.

src: 他说，与之相比，在上一波的德尔塔疫情中，他治疗的新冠患者“呼吸困难，血氧水平低。
tgt: He said that, in comparison, the COVID-19 patients he treated in the last round of epidemic suffered from “breathing difficulties and low blood oxygen.
hypo: He suffered from low blood oxygen levels compared to the previous wave of the COVID-19 pandemic.

src: 许多人几天内就要住院 ” 。
tgt: Many of them needed to be hospitalized within only a few days”.
hypo: Many people will have to stay in the hospital within only a few days.

src: 在南部非洲首次报告奥密克戎变异毒株后的两周内，其他医生也分享了类似的经验。
tgt: Other doctors shared similar experience within 2 weeks after the first report of Omicron the new variant in South Africa.
hypo: In the two weeks following the initial report of Omicron's mysterious illness, other doctors shared similar experiences.

src: 虽然收集足够的数据还需要几个星期的时间，但医生的观察和早期证据提供了一些线索。
tgt: Although it will take some more weeks to collect sufficient evidence, observation and early proof from doctors have provided some clues.
hypo: Although we have collected enough data, it will still take a few weeks for the doctor to observe and provide some early clues.

src: 据南非国家传染病研究所总结：在近几周住院的新冠患者中，只有30%是严重病症，是前一波疫情重症比例的一半；平均住院时间从8天缩短到2.8天；近期的新冠患者中，仅有3%死亡，而在南非早期爆发的病例中，死亡比例达20 % 。
tgt: According to the summary made by National Institute of Infectious Diseases of South Africa, among the patients of COVID-19 who were hospitalized within the last few weeks, only 30% of them were severe cases, which accounts for a half of the proportion of severe cases of the last round of epidemic; the average stay at hospital is reduced from 8 days to 2.8 days; only 3% of the latest patients of COVID-19 died, which used to be as high as 20% in the cases of the early epidemic phase in South Africa.
hypo: According to the South African National Institute of Communicable Diseases, only 30% of the hospitalized COVID-19 cases are severe, which is half of the previous pandemic ratio; the average hospital stay has shortened from 8 days to 2.8 days; in the recent cases, there is only 3% mortality, whereas in the early cases in South Africa, the mortality rate was 20%.

src: 非洲健康研究所所长威廉·哈内科姆（Willem Hanekom）引用国家传染病研究所的数据和其他报告说 ： “ 目前，几乎所有的迹象都表明，这是一种较温和的疾病 。 ”
tgt: By quoting the data from National Institute of Infectious Diseases of South Africa and other reports, Willem Hanekom, Director of Africa Institute of Health said, “At present, almost all the evidence indicates that this is a relatively mild disease.”
hypo: Willem Hanekom, the director of the Africa Health Research Institute, cited data from the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases and other reports to conclude that the symptoms suggest that COVID-19 is a relatively mild illness.

src: 他还说 ： “ 现在还是早期，我们需要获得后期数据。
tgt: He also said: “However, it’s still at early stage, and we need to obtain data of later stage.
hypo: He also said, "We need to obtain the data later."

src: 通常情况下，住院和死亡发生的时间较晚，而我们进入这一波疫情的时间只有两周 。 ”
tgt: In general situations, hospitalization and death happen later, and it’s only two weeks since we entered into this round of epidemic.”
hypo: We entered the wave of the flu two weeks ago.

src: 与此同时，世界各地的科学家正在观察病例数和住院率，同时测试目前的疫苗和治疗方法的效果。
tgt: At the same time, scientists from all over the whole world are observing the number of medical cases and the rate of hospitalization, as well as testing the effect of the current vaccines and treatment method.
hypo: Scientists around the world are observing the number of cases and hospital rates, while testing current vaccines and treatments.

src: 尽管德尔塔仍然是全世界主要的新冠病毒株，但奥密克戎病例正在数十个国家出现，其中南非为疫情中心。
tgt: Although Delta is still the main COVID-19 virus strain of the world, Omicron cases are emerging in dozens of countries with South Africa at the center of the epidemic.
hypo: Although Delta is still the most prevalent new coronavirus strain, it has been reported in several countries, with South Africa as the epicenter of the outbreak.

src: 据卫生官员介绍，豪登省在12月的第一周发现的新病例增加了400 % ， 测试显示，奥密克戎变体的病例占90%以上。
tgt: According to introduction from health officials, the new cases detected in Gauteng province in the first week of December increased by 400%; according to test results, Omicron variant cases accounted for more than 90%.
hypo: According to health officials, the number of new cases of Omicron variant in Gauteng province in December increased by 400%, and tests show that Omicron variant accounts for over 90% of the cases.

src: 教育时评:拯救被拐儿童要靠什么？
tgt: Education news commentary: What should we do to rescue abducted children?
hypo: What is needed to rescue abducted children?

src: 如果类比“没有买卖就没有杀害”的著名公益广告语，那么，在没有“收拐”需求的良好环境里，群防群治、全民反拐，使拐卖行为无利可图、风险大、成本高，这类犯罪也就不会屡屡发生。
tgt: As the famous public service advertising says, “there is no killing if there is no buying”; in a good environment with no demand of “buying abducted children”, if the masses can prevent and fight against abduction together and make abduction an action with no benefit, high risk and cost, then such crimes will not happen again.
hypo: If the famous pro-social advertising slogan "Without buying and selling, there is no harm" is absent in a good environment, group prevention and mass boycott will be more likely to occur, making the behavior risky, expensive, and unlikely to happen again.

src: 近日，公安部刑事侦查局打拐办开发的儿童失踪信息紧急发布平台上线。
tgt: Recently, the platform of emergency release of missing children information developed by the Anti-Abduction Office of Criminal Investigation Bureau of the Ministry of Public Security went online.
hypo: The Ministry of Public Security's Missing Children Alert System went online yesterday.

src: 这是为建立儿童失踪信息发布的权威渠道、及时找回被拐儿童而创设的互联网信息平台。
tgt: This is an Internet information platform established as an authoritative channel for the release of missing children information and timely finding the abducted children.
hypo: This is the authoritative channel and timely created internet platform for finding lost children.

src: 听闻此App名为“团圆 ” ， 顿觉暖意十足。
tgt: I feel warm after hearing the App is named “reunion”.
hypo: I feel satisfied after hearing the name of the app "round".

src: 新技术手段不仅名称“文艺 ” 、 情怀满满，而且信息化运用得当，实用、有效。
tgt: This new technical means not only has an “artistic” name and full of warm feelings, but also makes appropriate use of informatization, making itself practical and effective.
hypo: New technological methods are not only called "culture" and "emotional", but also makes appropriate use of information, which is practical and effective.

src: 打拐执法，首要目标是寻回被拐的孩子，保护其人身安全、自由。
tgt: The first and foremost objective of fighting against abduction is to find the abducted children and ensure their security and freedom.
hypo: The first and foremost goal is to locate the lost child and ensure their safety and freedom.

src: 其次才是对嫌疑人的审判与惩罚。
tgt: The judgment and punishment to the suspect is secondary.
hypo: Then it is the trial and punishment of the suspect.

src: 刑事惩罚的意义，从个别惩罚、社会预防到法律教育，可以列举很多“大词 ” 。
tgt: In terms of the significance of criminal punishment, lots of “big words” can be listed from individual punishment and social prevention to legal education.
hypo: The meaning of punishment, ranging from individual punishment, social prevention to legal education, can list many "big words".

src: 但在拐卖案件告破之前，应优先关注被害人的人身安全。
tgt: However, before solving an abduction case, the safety of the victims should be priority.
hypo: Before solving an abduction case, it is important to prioritize the safety of the victim.
