src: 三、就我而言，尽管不完全同意李伟东的有些说法，但我很在意他的说法，也很尊重李伟东这个人；因为他是认真的，他对中国是认真的，对中国的社会问题也是认真看待的。
tgt: 3. For me, although I don’t fully agree with some of Li Weidong’s statements, I really care about his statements and respect Li Weidong; Because he is conscientious, he is serious about China, and he also takes China’s social problems seriously.
hypo: Although I don't completely agree with some of Li Weidong's views, I highly respect him as a person. This is because he is sincere in his views on China, as well as sincere in his views on social issues in China.

src: 但我反对他的反共理论，我认为反必要革命，革命则必然导致社会动荡，民生受损，政治团体鱼龙混杂泥沙俱下，再就是外国趁虚而入。
tgt: But I oppose his anti-communist theory; I believe that unnecessary revolution should be opposed to; revolution will inevitably lead to social unrest and damage to people’s livelihood; political groups will be mixed, and foreign countries will avail themselves of the opportunity to get in.
hypo: Despite his revolutionary views, I believe that revolution is necessary, which will inevitably lead to social upheaval, disruption of people's lives, and political turmoil. Therefore, it is an opportunity to avail oneself of a foreign adventure.

src: 四、改变或改善中国要有耐心和为国为民负责的态度，政治投机企图火中取栗者，那不是右派，是混蛋。
tgt: 4. Changing or improving China requires patience and the attitude to be responsible for the country and the people; those who try to make money from political opportunities are not Rightists, but bastards.
hypo: China needs to have a compassionate attitude towards its people and a responsible attitude towards the nation, and political gambles should be handled with caution, as they are not Rightists.

src: 再聊聊左。
tgt: Let’s talk about Leftists.
hypo: Let's chat again.

src: 左，其实是一帮时代和政治的弃儿。
tgt: Leftists, in fact, are a group of outcasts of the times and politics.
hypo: Leftists

src: 如果说右具有对社会的积极意义，共产党还会在需要的时候听取一些右的言论和分析他们的思想，那么左就没这造化了，因为左所要的正是共产党所扔掉的糟粕！
tgt: If the Rightists are of positive significance to society, and the Communist Party will listen to some of the Rightists’ remarks and analyze their thoughts when necessary, the Leftists don’t have such luck, because what the Leftists want is the dross thrown away by the Communist Party!
hypo: If the Communist Party listens to Rightist ideas and analyzes their thoughts at the right time, then the Left won't have been created, because the only thing the Left wants to do is to tear down what the Communist Party has built!

src: 五、最近看到一些朋友边怼反贼边驳左癫，还挺动真气，我觉得大可不必。
tgt: 5. Recently, I saw some friends refuting the rebels and crazy Leftists at the same time, and they got really angry; I don't think it’s necessary at all.
hypo: I recently saw some of my friends refuting each other and getting angry, which made me feel uncomfortable.

src: 跟汉奸跟左癫都不要试图讲理，都是一根儿筋，无理可讲。
tgt: Don’t try to reason with rebels and crazy Leftists; they are all one track minded and unreasonable.
hypo: Don't try to reason with the rebels; they are all just a bunch of crazy people.

src: 也不要试图证明咱们是正确的，更不要想着让反贼和左癫承认，何必呢？
tgt: Don’t try to prove we are right, and don’t even think about asking rebels and crazy Leftists to admit it; why bother?
hypo: Don't try to prove that we are right, and don't want to admit that we are wrong, why?

src: 我这样告诉朋友们：当反贼骂你五毛，当左癫骂你右狗的时候，恰恰证明我们的这条中间道路是正确的！
tgt: I told my friends: when the rebels call you a fifty-cent and when the leftist call you a rightist dog, they prove we are on the correct track in the middle!
hypo: When the thieves curse you and the dogs bark at you, it proves that our middle path is the correct one!

src: 许多人少年时候也有理想，老了之后，却忘了理想，或追求理想，却沦为偏执。
tgt: Many people had dreams when they were young, but they forgot about them when they got older; or, they pursue their dreams and become paranoid.
hypo: Many people, both young and old, have dreams. After they grow up, however, they often forget their dreams, or pursue them haphazardly, becoming paranoid in the process.

src: 和理想渐行渐远，甚至屠龙少年终成恶龙。
tgt: They drift apart from their dreams and the young Dragon Slayer will eventually become a vicious dragon.
hypo: Dreams slowly drift away, eventually turning into nightmares.

src: 左右我觉得一般是指约束和自由，中国从历史文化的先天基因导致中国整体应该是偏左。
tgt: I think left and right generally refers to restraint and freedom; the innate genes of China’s history and culture make China overall relatively left.
hypo: China overall tends to be left-leaning due to its historical and cultural roots.

src: 而国内右派自由，注重效率和发展，左派加强监管，更注重公平以及安全。
tgt: The domestic Rightists are free and stress efficiency and development, while the Leftists strengthen supervision and pay more attention to fairness and safety.
hypo: The Right-wing emphasizes efficiency and development, while the Left emphasizes regulation and equality, as well as security.

src: 现在社会总体希望更注重公平，同时中美相争，偏左是肯定的，估计还得持续很多年。
tgt: At present, society overall hopes to pay more attention to justice; at the same time, it is certain that when China and the United States fight, it is bound to lean towards left, which is estimated to continue for many years.
hypo: Left-leaning governments are likely to remain in power in many countries for the foreseeable future due to the ongoing tension between the US and China.

src: 虽然看不懂，点赞就完事儿啦
tgt: Just like it if you don’t understand.
hypo: Although I don't understand, just one click is enough.

src: 啥也不说了，花花就是这么仗义
tgt: No need to say more, Huahua is generous.
hypo: Why didn't you say anything? It's your turn to do something.

src: 近两年，美帝对华为芯片的封锁和围堵，不仅让华为陷入前所未有的困境，也让“美系”企业遭遇巨大的损失。
tgt: In the past two years, the blockade and interception of the US on Huawei chips not only made Huawei fall into an unprecedented difficult position but also made “American” enterprises suffer from huge losses.
hypo: For the past two years, the US has locked and blocked Huawei, not only allowing the company to face unprecedented difficulties, but also letting "American" companies suffer huge losses.

src: 美帝打压中国芯片产业，要求自家企业及盟友国相关企业同时对我国芯片产业进行封锁，直接导致的后果就是全球芯片供应商的订单和利润受到影响，造成芯片生产企业的研发投入降低、产能下降，从而造成了全球范围内芯片供应链的短缺的紊乱。
tgt: The US suppresses China’s chips industry and required its own enterprises and relevant enterprises of its allies to block China’s chip industry at the same time; the direct consequence was that the number of orders and profits of global chip suppliers were affected, resulting in the decrease in the investment of research and development and production capacity of chip manufacturers, which further led to the disorder of chip supply chain shortages on a global scale.
hypo: The U.S. has imposed sanctions on China's chip industry, requiring domestic companies and allied governments to suspend ties with Chinese chip manufacturers, resulting in a disruption of the global chip supply chain, a decrease in research and development investment in the chip industry, and a shortage of the chip supply chain.

src: 如今“缺芯”已经波及到了全球各大行业，比如车企停产、手机涨价，几乎所有用到芯片的行业都深受其害。
tgt: Today, “lack of chips” has affected all major industries of the world, resulting in the suspension of production of car enterprises and rise in prices of mobile phones; almost all the industries using chips are greatly impacted.
hypo: Now, the global industries such as car manufacturing, mobile pricing, and almost every industry that uses chips have been affected by the suspension.

src: 为了掌握“芯片”自主权，越来越多国家的科技巨头开始走向“去美化”的道路。
tgt: To gain the right to make their own decisions on “chips”, more and more countries’ tech giants are taking the path of “de-Americanized”.
hypo: In order to grasp the chip self-determination, more and more countries' technology giants are walking down the path of de-Americanization.

src: 为了牢牢把控全球半导体控制权，牵制中国半导体行业的发展，最近老美动作频频，又是主持“芯片峰会”；又是邀请64国巨头成立半导体联盟，并拔款扶持美国本土科技巨头，比如，美帝老牌科技巨头英特尔为了夺回在芯片领域的主导地位，斥资200亿美元在美国亚利桑那州建2座晶圆加工厂，并对外开放芯片代工业务。
tgt: In order to firmly holding the right to control global semiconductor in its hands and pin down the development of China’s semiconductor industry, the United States have made frequent moves recently such as hosting the “chip summit”, inviting the giants of 64 countries to establish a semiconductor alliance and allocating funds to support the local technology giants in the United States; in order to regain its leading position in the chip industry, Intel, an old technology giant in the United States, spent $ 20 billion to build two wafer processing plants in Arizona, US and opened its chip OEM business.
hypo: In order to gain control of the global semiconductor industry, the United States has been actively pursuing China's semiconductor industry, while also hosting the "Chip Summit"; it has also invited 64 countries to form a semiconductor alliance, and has solicited billions of dollars from US domestic technology giants, such as Intel, to reclaim their leadership position in the chip industry. To this end, Intel has invested 200 million US dollars in the US state of Arizona to build two wafer fabs and open up foundry services to the outside world.

src: 当大多数人都以为，英特尔此番举动将对台积电造成一定冲击，并很有可能抢走台积电的“饭碗”。
tgt: When most people think Intel’s move will make certain impact on Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company and even steal their job.
hypo: When most people move, there is sure to be a certain amount of collisions with electricity and it is possible for them to steal electricity from the power grid.

src: 之所以这么肯定，是因为，英特尔作为美帝老牌科技巨头，在半导体领域深耕几十年，拥有大量的人才队伍和技术储备，必定能在短期内迅速崛起，打败台积电。
tgt: They are sure about it because Intel, as an old tech giant in the US, worked diligently in the semiconductor industry for dozens of years and have a large amount of talent teams and technological reserve; it is bound to rise within a short time and defeat Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company.
hypo: Because Intel has been a major player in the semiconductor industry for over two decades, they have accumulated a large number of talented teams and technological resources. This ensures that they will be able to quickly rise and surpass their competitors within a short period of time.

src: 然而，对于英特尔的这个决定，台积电创始人张忠谋却不屑一顾。
tgt: However, Zhang Zhongmou, founder of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company, sniffed at the decision of Intel.
hypo: Despite the decision of Intel's founder, Zhang Zhidong was unmoved.

src: 在今年四月举行的“2021大师智库论坛”上，张忠谋语出惊人，对于英特尔斥资建晶圆厂这个举动，张忠谋毫无顾忌直言：英特尔建芯片代工厂，相当讽刺。
tgt: At the “2021 Master Think Tank Forum” held in April this year, Zhang Zhongmou made a surprising remark and spoke bluntly about Intel’s move to build a wafer factory, “it is rather ironic for Intel to build an OEM factory of chips”.
hypo: At the "2021 Teacher's Wisdom Summit" held in April, Zhang Chuangtuo's words shocked the audience. He spoke bluntly about Intel's involvement in building a factory: "Intel is just a contract manufacturer; it's not worth mentioning."

src: 张忠谋之所以对英特尔进军晶圆领域颇为不屑，是因为张忠谋对30多年前台积电与英特尔的一段恩怨依然耿耿于怀。
tgt: Zhang Zhongmou disdained Intel’s decision to get into the wafer industry because Zhang Zhong still holds a grudge against a feud between Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company and Intel more than 30 years.
hypo: The reason why Zhang Chuangtou invaded the wafer industry 30 years ago was due to his long-standing grudge against Intel.

src: 上世纪六七十年代，英特尔一直是美帝制造业中的明珠，雄居全球巅峰的位置，是世界半导体领域的霸主。
tgt: In the 1960s and 1970s, Intel has been the pearl in the manufacturing industry of the United States, occupying the leading position in the world; it was a king in the semiconductor industry in the world.
hypo: In the 1960s and 1970s, Intel was the undisputed leader of the semiconductor industry, enjoying a position of global dominance in the emerging integrated circuit field.

src: 到上世纪80年代，世界半导体高端芯片一直被少数强者掌握。
tgt: Until the 1980s, the world's high-end semiconductor chips have been controlled by a few strong ones.
hypo: Until the 1980s, the strong ones had been dominating the high-end semiconductor market.

src: 当时半导体行业以IDM模式为特征，芯片从设计、制造到封测都是由一家工厂来完成，英特尔就是那个时代的代表。
tgt: At that time, the semiconductor industry was characterized by IDM mode; chips were designed, manufactured and sealed by the same factory, and Intel was a representative of that era.
hypo: At that time, the semiconductor industry was characterized by the IDM model, with chip design, manufacturing, and packaging all completed by a single factory. Intel was that era's representative.

src: 然而这样的模式让一些小企业不堪重负，很多半导体创业者面对巨额的产线建设费用只能望而却步。
tgt: However, such a model has overwhelmed some small enterprises, and many semiconductor entrepreneurs could only flinch in the face of huge production line construction costs.
hypo: However, such a model allows some small businesses to avoid heavy burdens, and many semiconductor entrepreneurs can only dream of having access to large-scale production lines at an affordable cost.

src: 在市场需求的感召下，进入80年代后，芯片行业开始出现分工合作的现象，1984年张忠谋听说有专门做芯片设计的公司，便认为既然有专门做设计的，那么就可以成立一家专门用于晶圆制造的工厂。
tgt: To respond to the calling of market demand, after entering the 1980s, the phenomenon of division of labor and cooperation of chips industry began to appear; in 1984, Zhang Zhongmou heard that there were companies specializing in chip design, so he thought that since there were companies specializing in design, a factory specializing in wafer manufacturing could be established.
hypo: In response to market demand, the chip industry began to appear in the 1980s, with companies such as Zhang Chuangtu listening to specialize in chip design. Since they specialized in design, they could then establish a factory for manufacturing chips.

src: 不久之后，张忠谋的设想变成了现实，台积电应运而生。
tgt: Soon after, Zhang Zhongmou’s imagination became reality, and Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company was created.
hypo: Shortly afterwards, Zhang Chuang's imagination became reality; the accumulation of electricity generated.

src: 台积电把主营业务瞄准了“晶圆加工”这个单一环节，不进行设计，只提供晶圆制造的代工服务。
tgt: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company aimed to set the single link of “processing of wafers” as its primary business; without design, only OEM services of wafer manufacturing was provided.
hypo: Wafer manufacturing is a single-link process aimed to provide wafer fabrication services without design.

src: 当时刚创立的台积电，在英特尔这个巨无霸面前就是小喽啰。
tgt: The newly established Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company was only a small player in front of Intel the giant.
hypo: When the giant was created, it stood in front of Intel, dwarfing it.

src: 为了获取资本支持，张忠谋就曾找英特尔投资，但当时英特尔一听说台积电只做芯片行业的制造环节，显然有些自视甚高，看不起台积电，果断拒绝对台积电进行投资。
tgt: In order to gain capital support, Zhang Zhongmou once approached Intel for investment, but Intel was arrogant when it heard Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company only participated in the manufacturing of the chips industry; Intel looked down on Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company and resolutely refused to invest in it.
hypo: In order to obtain capital support, Zhang Chuangtou had previously sought investment from Intel, but Intel was only interested in the manufacturing of chips and seemed to have a high opinion of itself, so it rejected Zhang Chuangtou's proposal to invest in the chips industry.

src: 张忠谋也认定英特尔当时是看不起晶圆制程服务的。
tgt: Zhang Zhongmou also believed that Intel despised wafer manufacturing services at that time.
hypo: Intel also believed that services were provided at that time.

src: 没想到当年看不起晶圆制造服务的巨头，如今却也要开始做晶圆代工。
tgt: Unexpectedly, the giant that looked down on wafer manufacturing services back in the days will also start to do wafer foundry now.
hypo: I never expected to be making wafers now, but I have to start making them.

src: 所以，张忠谋觉得英特尔进入晶圆代工很讽刺。
tgt: Therefore, Zhang Zhongmou thinks it is ironic for Intel to work on wafer foundry.
hypo: So, Zhang Chunguang felt very proud when he entered the crystal palace.

src: 如今台积电的市值已经超过了英特尔。
tgt: The market value of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company has surpassed that of Intel.
hypo: Today, Intel's market value has exceeded that of any other semiconductor company.

src: 面对台积电的强势进攻，英特尔自然也是不敢固步自封。
tgt: Facing the powerful attack of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company, Intel naturally dares not to stand still.
hypo: Faced with the strong offensive of Intel, it was impossible for it to remain still.

src: 如今，台积电已经向着3nm芯片冲刺，而英特尔仍然停留在7年前的14nm。
tgt: Now, Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company is trying to develop to the 3nm chips, and Intel still stays at the 14nm 7 years ago.
hypo: Intel is still trying to manufacture 3nm chips, despite having remained at 14nm for the past 7 years.

src: 想要赶超其实并非易事。
tgt: It is actually not difficulty to surpass it.
hypo: It is not easy to achieve the impossible.

src: 今天来看一些【奇怪的热搜】。
tgt: Let’s see some “strange trending topics” today.
hypo: Today I'm going to watch some [weird] searches.

src: 什么是正常的舆情？
tgt: What is normal public opinion?
hypo: What is the normal public opinion?

src: 随机挑选三个热搜：二月二龙抬头、好丽友涨价、货拉拉事件，舆情扩散形成波峰，然后【指数下降】（平滑曲线）最终消散，如果产生次生舆情会有小驼峰再次出现。
tgt: Select three trending topics randomly, the rise of the head of the dragon on the 2nd of February, the price rise of ORLON, and the Huolala incident; the public opinion spread to form a peak, and then the [index declined] to form a (smooth curve) until it finally dissipated; if a secondary public opinion occurs, there will be a small hump again.
hypo: Three trending topics: the Super Bowl Halftime Show, the Good Place Premiere, and the Oscars Controversy, resulting in a wave peak, then the index will gradually decline (a smooth curve), and if there is a second wave of sentiment, it will produce a small hump again.

src: 它们看起来和网信办官网曾展示的【网络舆情演化模型】相差无二。
tgt: They look no different from the [evolution model of online public opinion] once displayed on the official website of Cyberspace Administration.
hypo: They appear to differ greatly from the Cyberspace Administration's displayed [Network Emotional Evolution Model].

src: 什么是异常的舆情？
tgt: What is abnormal public opinion?
hypo: What is the abnormal public opinion?

src: 随机挑选同一事件中的六个热搜，呈现出【孤峰状】、【锯齿状】、【断崖状】。
tgt: Randomly select three trending topics from the same event, there are [solitary peak], [zigzag] and [cliff].
hypo: Randomly select six topics from the same event and present them as [isolated], [toothed], and [cliff-like].

src: 【孤峰状】即人为加热，迅速冲榜热搜，引起大众关注；【锯齿状】即周期性加热，确保话题盘踞热搜榜单；【断崖状】即集体撤离，该热搜发挥完“功能”，接到新任务、冲向新战场。
tgt: [Solidary peak] means the topic is artificially heated, quickly rushing to the trending topics list and attracting public attention; [Zigzag] refers to periodic heating, ensuring that topic stays on the trending topics list; [Cliff] means collective evacuation; after the topic has played its “function”, they received a new task and rushed to a new battlefield.
hypo: The first type, 【孤峰状】, triggers public attention quickly and causes a surge in popularity; the second type, 【锯齿状】, ensures periodic heating and keeps the topic at the top of the list; the third type, 【断崖状】, makes a clean break from the past and embarks on a new mission.

src: 图9中，一个事件的热度波峰恰好是另一事件的波谷，时间分秒不差，必定是统一批水军接到任务，开启新一轮攻势。
tgt: In picture 9, the peak of the heat wave of one event happens to be the trough of another event, and the time is exactly the same; it must be because a unified batch of paid internet trolls have received the task and started a new round of offensive.
hypo: In Figure 9, the peak of one event is the trough of another, and the time difference is negligible, so the forces must unify and launch a new offensive.

src: 黑公关的专业化可见一斑：几十个热搜同时上榜，哪些吸引目光、哪些负责科普、哪些引战造势、哪些转移视线、哪些影响认知、哪些误导判断、哪些煽动情感、哪些裹挟决策，黑产账号分批次、分节点精细化作战，几乎考虑到舆情传播扩散中的所有要素。
tgt: The professionalism of black public relations can be seen: dozens of trending topics are on the list at the same time, which attract attention, which are responsible for explanation, which lead to argument and accumulate momentum, which divert attention, which affect understanding, which mislead judgment, which incite emotion, which coerce decision-making; the black production accounts work in batches and conduct segmented operations in different batches and time nodes, taking into account almost all elements in the spread of public opinion.
hypo: Incite emotion, public relations, trending topics, influence cognition, mislead judgement, stimulate feelings, spread influence, segmentation, fine-tune strategy, consider all elements.

src: 传播是一门科学，抛开立场、情感所有主观因素，仅从客观数据，黑公关也会无处遁形。
tgt: Communication is a science which disregards all subjective factors such as standpoint and emotion and only takes into account objective data; black public relations will have nowhere to hide.
hypo: Spread is a science, throwing away subjective factors, only visible data, even the black box will be unpredictable.

src: 凡走过必留下痕迹，这样的痕迹，我们一起挖出来。
tgt: Traces will be left from anyone walked by, and we can dig out these traces together.
hypo: Anyone who has walked will leave a trace, such a trace, we can dig it out together.

src: 数据来源：热搜时光机。
tgt: Source of data: trending topics time machine.
hypo: Trending topics time machine.

src: 激光电视和传统电视在市场定位上有何差异？
tgt: What is the difference between laser TV and traditional TV in terms of the market positioning?
hypo: What differences exist between traditional and laser TVs on the market?

src: 以我的理解，题主所说的传统电视应该指的就是液晶电视，而激光电视和液晶电视在市场定位上的差异，主要有以下两点：
tgt: In my understanding, traditional TV which the original post mentioned is LCD TV, and the differences between laser TV and LCD TV in terms of market positioning are mainly the following two points:
hypo: In my understanding, the traditional TV referred to by the topic speaker is an LCD TV, and the difference between plasma and LCD TVs in the market mainly lies in two points: price and picture quality.

src: 第一，激光电视更聚焦大屏市场。
tgt: First, laser TV focuses more on big screen market.
hypo: First, the laser TV market will become more concentrated.

src: 相比液晶电视全面铺开的市场定位，激光电视显然更聚焦大屏市场，或者说激光电视本身就是为大屏而生的产物。
tgt: Compared with the all-round market positioning of LCD TV, laser TV is obviously more focused on the large screen market, or laser TV itself is a product of big screen.
hypo: Laser TV is a product of the laser TV market positioning, which is focused on the large-screen market.

src: 目前，主流液晶电视尺寸多在55英寸到65英寸，而激光电视的尺寸一般在75英寸以上，最大的超过100英寸，充分满足用户对大屏彩电的需求。
tgt: At present, the size of mainstream LCD TV is mainly from 55 to 65 inches, and the size of laser TV is usually over 75 inches, with bigger ones over 100 inches, which can satisfy the customers’ need for big screen TVs.
hypo: Currently, mainstream LCD TV sizes range from 55 inches to 65 inches, with the size of laser TVs typically ranging from 75 inches up to 100 inches, more than enough to satisfy user demands.

src: 近年来，激光电视在全球的出货量和销量占比都在不断增加，在80英寸及以上总体电视销量中占比超六成。
tgt: In recent years, the proportion of the global shipments and sales of laser TV keeps increasing, accounting for over 60% of the total TV sales of 80 inches and above.
hypo: In recent years, the global sales of LED TVs have been increasing significantly, accounting for over 60% of the total TV shipments.

src: 根据中怡康的预测，2020年，激光电视市场销量增长将超过140%，继续保持高速增长。
tgt: According to the prediction of CMM, the sales volume of laser TV market in 2020 will increase by over 140% and will continue to maintain a high-speed growth.
hypo: According to China's prediction, the growth of the laser TV market in 20

src: 之所以在大屏市场有如此好的成绩，主要归功于激光电视在护眼方面的出色表现。
tgt: The reason for such great result in the big screen market is mainly the outstanding performance of laser TVs in eye protection .
hypo: The excellent performance of the bright television in the protection of the eyes is mainly due to.

src: 基于激光电视漫反射的成像原理，激光光源发出的光线并不直射入眼球，相比液晶电视的背光源发光，成像过程更接近自然条件下物体的成像过程，对眼睛产生的刺激也更小。
tgt: Based on the imaging principle of diffuse reflection of laser TV, the light emitted by the laser light source does not go directly into the eyeball; compared with the backlight of LCD TV, its imaging process is closer to that of objects under natural conditions, with less irritation to the eyes.
hypo: Based on the principle of laser television imaging, the light emitted by the laser source is not directly focused into the eye, compared to the backlight source of a liquid crystal television, the imaging process is closer to natural conditions, and the stimulation to the eye is also smaller.

src: 中国电子技术标准化研究院赛西实验室和北京协和医院眼科专家，通过人群相同条件下观看激光电视和液晶电视的严格对比试验，得出了144组测试数据。
tgt: Ophthalmologists from CES Laboratory, China Electronics Standardization Institute, and Peking Union Medical College Hospital obtained 144 groups of test data through a strict comparative experiment of watching laser TV and LCD TV under the same conditions.
hypo: The Peking Union Medical College Ophthalmology Department and the Beijing Eye Hospital ophthalmologists conducted a strict comparison test of laser TV and liquid crystal TV under the same conditions, resulting in 144 data points.

src: 数据证实：激光电视的确具有很强的护眼特性，在特定方面甚至具有一定的改善作用。
tgt: Statistics prove that laser TVs can indeed protect the eyes and may even make improvement in certain aspects.
hypo: Indeed, laser TVs possess very strong protective characteristics, even in certain aspects having certain improvement.

src: 在视力健康越来越受重视的当下，激光电视不仅凭借护眼优势吸引了越来越多用户，也打开了彩电市场的另一个突破口。
tgt: As eye protection is gaining more and more attention, laser TVs not only attracted more and more customers with the feature of eye protection, but also made another breakthrough in the market of color TVs.
hypo: As the importance of eye health is increasingly recognized, laser TVs are attracting more and more users, opening up a new breakthrough in the colorful market.

src: 第二，激光电视更聚焦高端市场。
tgt: Second, laser TV focuses more on high-end market.
hypo: Laser TV is focusing on the high-end market.

src: 与液晶电视价格不断下探相反，目前市售激光电视的价格大多在万元以上，随着尺寸和光源的升级，价格逐步攀升。
tgt: Contrary to the downward trend of the price of LCD TVs, price of laser TVs on the market now is over 10,000 yuan, and it went up gradually with the upgrading of size and source of light.
hypo: The price of laser TVs has been increasing rapidly, as the size and quality of the TVs improve.

src: 激光电视凭什么卖这么贵呢？
tgt: Why are laser TVs so expensive?
hypo: What is so expensive about TVs?

src: 肯定是有道理的。
tgt: There must be a reason.
hypo: There must be a reason.

src: 在光源和技术水平的不断发展下，激光电视有很多液晶电视和投影都无法实现的优势。
tgt: With the continuous development of light source and technology, laser TVs have advantages that many LCD TVs and projectors don’t.
hypo: As technology continues to develop, laser TVs offer many advantages over traditional LCD and projection TVs, such as improved picture quality and a wider viewing angle.

src: 凭借超短焦距投影技术，激光电视的投影距离相对传统投影设备来说要更短，能够在短距离内实现100英寸大屏体验，所需空间不大，而且主机小巧，占用地方很小。
tgt: With the super short focus projection technology, the projection distance of laser TVs is shorter than that of traditional projection equipment; it can realize the 100 inch large screen experience within a short distance; the space required is not large, and the small host takes up very little space.
hypo: Focus projection technology makes it possible to achieve a 100-inch screen experience from a short projection distance, with a small host computer, small space requirements, and minimal footprint.

src: 在亮度方面，大品牌激光电视可以达到2000以上的流明。
tgt: In terms of lightness, laser TVs from famous brands can reach over 2,000 lumens.
hypo: Laser TVs can reach a brightness of over 2000.

src: 加之发热量更低，对设备损耗小，电视的使用寿命也更长。
tgt: Plus, the heat is lower, equipment loss is small, and the service life of TV is longer.
hypo: Make sure to include these words: is longer, equipment loss, is lower.

src: 除此之外，很多高端激光电视机型还搭载了真4K超高清画质、人工智能系统、仿生屏等众多前沿技术，能够给用户带来更震撼的视听体验。
tgt: In addition, many high-end laser TVs are equipped with real 4K ultra HD image, artificial intelligent systems, bionic screens and other cutting-edge technologies, bringing users a more stunning audio-visual experience.
hypo: In addition, many high-end laser TV models also come with 4K ultra-high resolution, artificial intelligence systems, and immersive sound experiences, providing users with an even more stunning visual and audio experience.

src: 谈不上伪需求，而是需求细分的产物，论画质和投入产出比，激光电视不是影音玩家的菜，想兼顾大屏和观看环境不足，可以尝试，凡事皆有利弊，权衡过后自己判断即可，就怕听信一面之词。
tgt: It's not so much of a fake demand, but the product of demand segmentation; when it comes to image quality and input-output ratio, laser TVs are not what video and audio enthusiasts are after; if you want to take into account the lack of large screen and viewing environment, you can try it; everything has its pros and cons, and you can make a decision yourself after deliberation; just don’t listen to only one side of the story.
hypo: Laser TVs are not just for entertainment, but for discerning viewers who prioritize picture quality and an immersive viewing environment. Although there may be some drawbacks, it is ultimately up to each person to weigh the pros and cons and make their own judgement.

src: 简单说，超广角近焦投影机--激光电视，为了贴近幕布，不得不使用价格昂贵的超广角透镜和反射镜，这不符合光学最佳设计。
tgt: Simply put, in order to get close to the screen, ultra wide angle close focus projector, laser TV, has to use expensive ultra wide angle lens and reflector, which is not in line with the best optical design.
hypo: The expensive ultra-wide angle lens and reflector do not conform to the optical ideal design, as they are too costly.

src: 为了屏蔽部分环境光，使用微结构的菲涅尔幕布，代价高昂，80寸的价格基本能换个65寸液晶。
tgt: In order to shield part of the ambient light, it uses an expensive microstructure Fresnel screen; the price of an 80-inch laser TV basically can be changed into a 65-inch LCD TV.
hypo: To block part of the environment light, use Phifertex fabric, which is expensive, but the price of 80 inches can be exchanged for 65 inches of liquid crystal.

src: 还有一点，我特别讨厌投影厂商拿漫反射对眼睛好这种当卖点，拜托，眼睛能够看到的幕布上的光线对于眼睛而言就是直射光，你漫反射到天花板上，眼睛也看不到，非要较真液晶电视也是漫“直射”，打开电视天花板不也被照亮吗？
tgt: Another point is that I especially hate it when projector manufacturers using “diffuse reflection is good for the eyes” as a selling point; please, eyes can see the light on the screen means that it is direct light to the eyes; when it hit the ceiling, eyes cannot see it; if you want to be serious about it, then LCD TV also uses diffused “direct light”; isn’t the ceiling also illuminated when you turn on the TV?
hypo: I especially can see the light from the projector reflected on the screen, the light for the eyes is like a direct beam, you can't see it on the television, even if you open the television, it won't be illuminated, right?

src: 而且，投影幕布如果不是漫反射，根本成不了像。
tgt: Moreover, if the projection screen does not use diffuse reflection, imaging is not possible at all.
hypo: Moreover, if the projection screen is not mirrored, it will not look like the original.

src: 恰恰被忽略了高增益幕布的热斑（光斑）效应，某一角度大量光线反射到眼睛，那才是真难受。
tgt: The hot spot (light spot) effect of the high gain screen is ignored, and a large amount of light at a certain angle being reflected into the eyes is really uncomfortable.
hypo: The light at a certain angle reflected a lot of light into the eyes, making it really uncomfortable.

src: 小雨伞买保险，靠谱吗?
tgt: Is it safe to buy insurance on Little Umbrella?
hypo: Is little safe?

src: 小雨伞是一个互联网的保险经纪平台。
tgt: Little Umbrella is an insurance brokerage platform on the internet.
hypo: Little Umbrella is an online insurance platform.

src: 从设置条件来看：按照《保险经纪机构监管规定(2015年修订)》提示来看，成为保险经纪公司的，必须满足三个关键词：股东、发起人最近3年无重大违法记录、最低限额为人民币5000万元才可以成立、必须经过中国保监会同意。
tgt: In terms of setup conditions: according to the "Regulations on the Supervision of Insurance Brokerage Institutions (revised in 2015)", the following three key requirements must be met to become an insurance brokerage company, shareholders and initiator have no major illegal records in the past three years, the minimum limit is 50 million yuan, and it must be approved by the CIRC.
hypo: In accordance with the Insurance Regulatory Authority's regulations (2015 revision), to become an insurance company, the following conditions must be met: the shareholders must have no major violations in the past three years, the minimum capital is 500,000 yuan, and it must be approved by the China Insurance Regulatory Commission.

src: 这三条其实就是很苛刻的，总结起来就是要有实力，要经过银保监会（监管全国内的保险公司、银行）的国家权威部门批准、股东要有良好的作风，作为保险经纪公司的小雨伞保险，投保者是不用过多质疑小雨伞保险是正规的与否，毕竟有这3条门槛，不是什么保险公司都能达到的。
tgt: These three requirements are strict enough; in summary, it needs to have strength, to be approved by the national authoritative departments of the China Banking and Insurance Regulatory Commission (supervising insurance companies and banks across the country), and the shareholders’ conduct is descent; as an insurance brokerage company, Little Umbrella Insurance doesn’t need to be questioned by policyholders about whether it is legal or not; after all, not all insurance companies can meet these three requirements.
hypo: This three-pronged approach is quite challenging, as it requires regulatory approval from the government, the backing of reputable investors, and the Little Umbrella brand to succeed. Little Umbrella insurance is a legitimate form of insurance, but it is not available from every brokerage company.

src: 在这一点上，还不错，是值得信赖的。
tgt: In this regard, it is not bad and worth trusting.
hypo: In this regard, it is still worth trusting.

src: 从保险产品来看：小雨伞保险就是一个保险超市，很多公司的明星重疾险都在这家平台上出售，如最新上架的和泰超级玛丽5号重疾险，理赔方和承保方都是和泰人寿，小雨伞保险只是第三方中介，不用质疑它的靠谱性。
tgt: In terms of insurance products: Little Umbrella Insurance is an insurance supermarket, with star serious illness insurances of many companies on sale on this platform; for example, for the newly added HTLIC Super Mario 5 serious illness insurance, both the claim adjuster and the insurer are HTLIC, and Little Umbrella Insurance is only the third-party intermediary, whose reliability does not need to be questioned.
hypo: From insurance products: Umbrella Insurance is like an insurance supermarket, where many companies' celebrities put their high-risk items up for sale, such as the newly released and luxurious Maybach 5 supercar, with both the plaintiff and the defendant being Thai people. Umbrella Insurance is just a third-party intermediary, so you don't have to worry about its reputation.

src: 从缴费模式来看：互联网平台的产品，因为少了营业网点的经营费用，和业务员工资的成本，所以互联网产品普遍性价比比较高，而且缴费方式灵活，支持月缴，减轻投保人的缴费压力，同时可以最大限度的撬动保险的杠杆。
tgt: In terms of payment method: due to the lack of the operating expenses of the business outlets and the cost of the sales people’s salaries, internet products are generally cost-effective, and the payment method is flexible, which supports monthly payment; it reduces the payment pressure of the policyholder, and can leverage of the insurance lever to the greatest extent in the meantime.
hypo: From an insurance perspective, internet products have the advantage of being cost-effective since they eliminate the need for physical storefronts and associated overhead costs, as well as the labor costs of business owners and employees. This makes internet products generally more affordable than traditional products, while also being flexible with payment options such as monthly payments, which can reduce the payment pressure on customers, and can maximize the potential of insurance products.

src: 这点还是非常不错的。
tgt: This is good.
hypo: This is very good.

src: 可以考虑。
tgt: It can be considered.
hypo: You can consider it.

src: 从业务员专业度来看：这点尤为重要，因为保险是一个专业度要求非常强的行业，很多互联网产品客户可以自己投保，这种就会存在很多的误区，在健康告知和职业这块，非保险从业人员往往在投保的时候会添加自己的主观意识，觉得自己健康或者符合，这样容易存在很多理赔隐患，有可能被拒赔的风险。
tgt: In terms of the professional level of sales personnel: this is especially important as insurance industry has a strict requirement on expertise; for many internet products, customers can apply for insurance by themselves, which will cause many misunderstandings; in terms of health notification and occupation, non-insurance practitioners often add their subjective awareness when applying for insurance, and feel that they are healthy or in line with it; like this, there will be a lot of hidden dangers in claims settlement and the risk of being rejected.
hypo: From an insurance professional's perspective, this is very important because the insurance industry requires a very high level of expertise. Many internet products customers can self-insure, which can lead to a lot of confusion and errors. When it comes to health and profession, insurance professionals often add their own subjective judgement, which can easily lead to misrepresentation and even fraud.

src: 我自己曾在“腾讯微保”（和小雨伞一样，也是互联网保险经纪平台）做过保险电话销售，非常负责任的告诉大家。
tgt: I worked as insurance telemarketing personnel in “Tencent Micro-Insurance” (like Little Umbrella, it is also an Internet insurance brokerage platform), and I can tell you.
hypo: I have worked at Little Umbrella, which is an online insurance platform, selling insurance over the phone, and it was very responsible.

src: 互联网的保险是真的，也靠谱，不靠谱的是人，互联网渠道没有专业的从业人员，也有很多的销售误导。
tgt: The insurance products on the internet are real and reliable, and it is the people who are not reliable; there are no professional practitioners on the internet, and there is much misleading information in sales.
hypo: The insurance offered by the internet is real, but it is unreliable, as it is operated by non-professionals and there is a lot of misleading information.

src: 比如：1元保险保600万，买保险送手机，免费领取6万重疾保额，这些营销策略没有错，可是却避重就轻，不会告诉投保人，首月1元，次月是需要按正常收费的，几十到200不等，很多客户扣费一两年自己买的是个啥不清楚。
tgt: For example: there is nothing wrong with sales strategies like 1 yuan insurance covers 6 million yuan, buy insurance and get free mobile phones, and get 60,000 serious illness insurance coverage for free; however, they withhold important information and won't tell the policyholder that the first month is 1 yuan, and the fee next month is charged normally, ranging from a few dozens to 200; many customers don’t know what they bought after they’ve been charged for one or two years.
hypo: Many customers are unaware that their insurance premiums are subsidized by the government, and that they only need to pay a small fee of 1-200 yuan per month. After the first month, the fee is usually charged on a regular basis and is not refundable.

src: 以为可以花1块钱，保险公司赔600万（天下掉馅饼）。
tgt: They thought they could spend 1 yuan and get a six million claim settlement from the insurance company (pie in the sky).
hypo: The insurance company will pay 600,000 yuan for the claim.

src: 免费送手机，是保单尾号比如6666，8888这种特殊保单号段才送的，并且如果中奖短信发出，自己不兑换，也没有人提醒的。
tgt: Getting mobile phone for free means only policy ending with special numbers such as 6666 and 8888 can get a free phone, and no one will remind you again if the text message is sent to you and you don’t redeem it yourself.
hypo: Getting a reminder is special.

src: （这对于投保人来说，就又是一个坑）免费领6万重疾保额，是短期的，如果只靠这个，没有其他商业险，万一真发生重疾，6万能干嘛，解决不了问题，以后的生活开始裸奔。
tgt: (This is yet another trap for the policyholder) It is a short-term activity to claim 60000 serious disease insurance for free; if you only rely on this and there is no other commercial insurance, 60000 yuan will not solve any problem in case of the happening of a serious disease, and you will have nothing in your life later.
hypo: For the insured, it's just another hole in the ground. Free insurance of 6 million yuan is short-term, if there is no other business risk, 6 million can solve the problem, life later will be full of surprises.

src: 目前对于互联网保险销售的误导，国家也在严厉打击。
tgt: Our country is also cracking down on misleading Internet insurance sales at present.
hypo: At present, both the government and the insurance industry are aggressively combatting the misinformation surrounding internet insurance.

src: 所以综合来看，平台是没有问题，产品也没有问题，有问题的是业务员的专业度和职业操守。
tgt: Therefore, there is no problem with the platform or the products; what matters is the professionalism and professional integrity of the salesperson.
hypo: Therefore, the platform is not a problem, nor is the product. The problem lies in the professionalism and integrity of the staff.

src: 建议题主综合慎重考虑，其实很多线下保险经纪公司的产品更广，客户可以选择的机会和产品更多，有些产品的性价比也优于互联网产品。
tgt: It is suggested that the original post should think about it carefully; in fact, there are many offline insurance brokerage companies with a wider range of products, and customers have more opportunities and products to choose from; some products are better than Internet products in terms of cost performance.
hypo: Make sure to consider many offline products, as there are some that are better value than online products.

src: 我自己就帮助过59位互联网客户，承保线下产品，保费每个人节约2000-3000元/年。
tgt: I myself have helped 59 Internet customers to underwrite offline products, helping each person save 2000-3000 yuan of premium per year.
hypo: I have helped 59 online customers by underwriting the product and charging a fee of between 2,000 and 3,000 yuan per year.

src: 如果大家有什么疑问，欢迎与我沟通和交流。
tgt: If you have any question, feel free to communicate with me.
hypo: If you have any questions, please feel free to communicate and exchange with me.

src: 我：明亚保险经纪人，有过3年企业管理培训经验，服务过近千家企业用户，合作超过100家保险公司，在投保前，我会从客户需求出发，为客户量身定制保险产品，投保中，为客户货比三家，尽力为客户争取最好的核保结果，投保后，为客户做保单整理，保单托管，让客户放心无忧。
tgt: I am a Mingya Insurance Broker and have three years of experience in enterprise management training; I have served almost a thousand enterprise users and cooperated with over 100 insurance companies; before insuring, I will analyze the needs of my client and customize products for them; while insuring, I will compare all the insurance companies and help my client achieve the best underwriting result; after insuring, I will organize and hold the insurance policy to make my client feel at ease.
hypo: I am an experienced insurance broker with 3 years of industry experience. I have served over 1000 enterprise customers and collaborated with over 100 insurance companies. Before insuring, I will start from customer needs and customize insurance products. During insuring, I will strive to get the best coverage for the customer. After insuring, I will meticulously handle the paperwork, manage the claim, and make sure the customer is at peace of mind.

src: 跟每个客户一起终身成长。
tgt: Grow with each client for a lifetime.
hypo: Grow together with each client for life.

src: 希望我的回答能够对题主有所帮助！
tgt: Hopefully my answer will help the original post!
hypo: I hope my response can help the original post!

src: 根据保险监管部门的定义，互联网保险就是投保人点击投保链接后，可以自主完成所有的投保流程的保险业务。
tgt: According to the definition of insurance supervising departments, Internet insurance is an insurance business in which the applicant can complete the entire insurance process independently after clicking the insuring link.
hypo: According to the definition of the Insurance Regulatory Department, when an applicant clicks on the insurance link, they can complete all the insurance business processes autonomously.

src: 在这个过程中，投保人不需要签字，保险顾问也不需要签字，所有步骤全部都可以由投保人自主完成。
tgt: In this process, neither the applicant nor the insurance consultant needs to sign, so all the steps can be fulfilled independently by the applicant.
hypo: In this process, neither the insurance consultant nor the customer needs to sign any documents, all steps can be completed by the customer themselves.

src: 虽然互联网保险的投保没太有“仪式感”，甚至可能连打印版的纸质合同都没有，但是这丝毫不影响电子版合同的有效性与法律效力。
tgt: Although insuring an Internet insurance product has no “sense of ritual”, and even there is no printed copy of contact, it doesn’t affect the validity and legal effect of electronic contract at all.
hypo: Even though there is no "ceremony feeling" to online insurance, it does not affect the validity and legal force of the electronic contracts.

src: 这种模式，有点类似于“电话销售”一般的流水线作业，但如此购买保险也会有一个致命的问题，那就是——后续的服务可能会跟不上。
tgt: This pattern is somewhat similar to assembly line operation of “telemarketing”, but buying insurance this way will also have a fatal problem, that is, the follow-up service may not keep up.
hypo: This mode is similar to a typical telephone sales job, but buying insurance has a potentially fatal problem — the follow-up service may not be up to par.

src: 保险通常是一份长达几十年的长期契约，我们在购买保险的时候，是不是应该认真思考一下，我们所选择的这个“中介”，是不是一个可以与我们长期相伴、在很多年后也会给我们提供服务的“保险中介人”呢？
tgt: Insurance is usually a long-term contract that lasts for decades; when we buy insurance, shouldn’t we seriously consider whether the “intermediary” we choose is an “insurance intermediary” who can accompany us for a long time and provide services to us many years later?
hypo: Insurance is usually a binding contract lasting several decades, and when purchasing insurance, we should carefully consider our selection of "intermediaries", as they will be able to provide us with services for many years to come.

src: 从以前到现在，我都反对任何形式的污蔑和谩骂，更不能接受这类人身攻击的行为。
tgt: I have been against any form of insult or abuse since the beginning, and I will not stand such personal attacks.
hypo: From the past to the present, I have always opposed any form of abuse and humiliation, and I will never accept such attacks on my person.

src: 在文明社会，我们可以包容一切，但就是要杜绝这种恶棍。
tgt: In this civilized society, we can tolerate everything, but we need to get rid of these bullies.
hypo: In a civilized society, we can tolerate everything, but we must draw the line at this kind of evil.

src: 如果不看政党和派系，要先抵制的，就是这种不文明的作风。
tgt: If you don’t look at political parties and factions, it is this uncivilized actions that should be boycotted first.
hypo: If you don't support political factions, it is uncivilized to oppose them.

src: 从你开始发来脸书加好友请求开始，进而发表具调侃性的帖子，再到你试图把所谓我的家地点和父亲名字发布在社交媒体上，我都已经采取不回应的态度。
tgt: I never replied to you since you started to send me Facebook friend request, published ridicule posts, and then tried to post the so-called location of my home and my father’s name on social media.
hypo: From the start, you have been sending friend requests and posting flirtatious messages, trying to get my address and father's name published on social media. I have not responded to any of it.

src: 你过后变本加厉地不只按一日六餐的频率持续tag我，更在脸书跟你的所谓朋友们继续肆无忌惮地讨论着关于我一些隐晦、羞辱的言论，样貌、身材、好生养、又什么床上种草莓、要不要插之类的留言，我...也算了。
tgt: After that, you made it worse by not only continuing to tag me six times a day, but also continuing to wantonly discuss with your so-called friends on Facebook about some obscure and humiliating remarks about me, my appearance, figure, shape fit for giving birth, getting love bites in bed, whether to penetrate or not, I... forget it.
hypo: You continued to tag me even after I asked you to stop, and you continued to talk about me in a derogatory manner, such as insulting my appearance, lifestyle, and habits. You also talked about planting grass on my bed and whether or not I should do it. I... also counted.

src: 怎知后来我更收到多位朋友发来有关你的脸书朋友户口上载一张你的照片和具性骚扰成分的言论。
tgt: It was unexpected that more people sent me a photo uploaded to your Facebook friends page and your harassing comments.
hypo: I was surprised to receive so many messages from my friends after I posted a picture of my face on social media.

src: 抱歉，作为一位女生，我再也无法继续沉默了。
tgt: Sorry, I cannot be silent anymore as a girl.
hypo: Sorry, as a woman, I couldn't continue being silent anymore.

src: 我报警的新闻上载后，你完全没有收敛，反而更越发嚣张。
tgt: After the news of me calling the police was published, you did not restrain yourself at all, but became more arrogant.
hypo: After I reported the news, you didn't catch a single one, instead you became more and more excited.

src: 我不理你是什么政治背景，也不管你是什么身份地位，在我们的社会，是需要两性尊重的。
tgt: I don’t care about your political background or your identity or position; in our society, the two genders shall respect each other.
hypo: In our society, we need to show respect to both genders.

src: 是的，你们可以继续这种具调侃性、隐晦、羞辱、辱骂的言论，你也可以继续说你只是关爱和关注我，你可以继续认为这并不是骚扰、你甚至可以继续否认那不是你制的图或者继续发表一切攻击性言论。
tgt: Yes, you can continue with your ridicule, obscure, humiliating and abusive remarks; you can continue to say that you just care about and pay attention to me; you can continue to think that this is not harassment; you can even continue to deny that you made the pictures or continue to make all the offensive remarks.
hypo: You can even continue this type of offensive language, insults, and criticism. You can continue to think that it is not disturbing, you can even continue to deny that it is your creation or continue to post offensive speech.

src: 没错，我不能，也没有能力阻止你们。
tgt: Yes, I can’t and won’t stop you.
hypo: I can't stop you.

src: 我既不认识你，也不想认识你，我的样貌和身材更不需要你评头论足。
tgt: I don’t know you and I don’t want to know you, and my appearance and body don’t need you judgement.
hypo: I don't recognize you, and I don't want to recognize you. My appearance and body do not require your judgment or comments.

src: 我甚至不认为会有哪一位女生愿意让别人如此地羞辱自己来换来出名。
tgt: I don’t even think any girl would want to be famous by being humiliated like this.
hypo: I don't think any girl would be willing to be humiliated in such a way in order to gain fame.

src: 朋友问我，还好吗？
tgt: My friends asked me if I was okay.
hypo: My friend asked me if I was okay.

src: 我说好，你也不会信。
tgt: You won’t believe it if I say yes.
hypo: I said, "You will not believe it."

src: 我觉得不会有任何一位女生被如此霸凌后还可以说自己还好。
tgt: I don’t think any girl could say they are okay after being bullied like this.
hypo: No girl could say okay after being treated so badly.

src: 无论在工作、社会、政坛或商界，只有那些连基本品德都没有的人，才会选择用这种方式来伤害任何一位女性。
tgt: No matter it’s in the workplace, society, politics or the business world, only those without basic moral character will harm a woman in this way.
hypo: Regardless of work, society, politics, or business, only those who lack basic morality will choose to harm any woman in such a way.

src: 我相信，公道自在人心。
tgt: I believe justice is in everyone’s heart.
hypo: I believe, goodness lies in everyone's heart.

src: 我截了部分留言给大家评理
tgt: I took screenshots of part of the comments and you can make your judgement.
hypo: I have filtered out some of the comments to be reviewed by everyone.

src: 你自己发的贴应该没有人可以冒充你了吧
tgt: You posted it yourself, and no one will pretend to be you, right?
hypo: You should not be pretending to be someone else.

src: 我只能说你是文明的公敌
tgt: I can only say you’re the enemy of civilization.
hypo: I can only say that you are my enemy.

src: 会心一笑
tgt: Smile
hypo: He/She smiled.

src: 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 2022-01-17 多维 亲中共媒体多维报道：中美关系最新消息：最新卫星图像显示，美国三艘航母正在中国周边集结；美媒还披露，美国海军武器库中最强大的武器之一罕见访问关岛，对印太地区美国的盟友与敌手释放重要信号。
tgt: Three US aircraft carriers assemble around China; the most powerful weapons visit Guam in rare situation 2022-01-17 multidimensional Pro Communist media multidimensionally reports: latest news on China US Relation: the latest satellite image showed that three US aircraft carriers are assembling around China; US media also disclosed that one of the most powerful weapons in the US Navy’s arsenal in a rare case visited Guam, and sent an important signal to US allies and enemies in the Indo-Pacific region.
hypo: The United States has deployed three aircraft carriers around China, showing the strength of the US-China relationship and releasing important signals to the region.

src: 据中国智库“南海战略态势感知平台”消息，1月9日，卫星在巴拉巴克海峡附近发现了美军“卡尔·文森”号（USS Carl Vinson）航母。
tgt: According to Chinese think-tank “South China Sea Strategic Situation Detection Platform”, on January 9, the satellite found the USS Carl Vinson aircraft carrier from the US army near the Balabac Strait.
hypo: According to a Chinese think-tank, the satellite discovered the USS Carl Vinson (USS Carl Vinson) in the Bab el-Mandeb Strait.

src: 巴拉巴克海峡连通南海和苏禄海，是西太平洋第一岛链上的战略要地。
tgt: Connecting the South China Sea and Sulu Sea, the Balabac Strait is a strategic place on the first island chain in the Western Pacific.
hypo: Sulu Strait connects the South China Sea and the Sulu Sea, which is the strategic location in the Western Pacific.

src: 该平台预计，“卡尔·文森”号将前往南海部署。
tgt: The platform predicts that Carl Vinson will do deployment at the South China Sea.
hypo: The platform predicts that Karl Marx will go to the South China Sea.

src: 这是“卡尔·文森”号航母首次搭载F-35C战斗机和CMV-22“鱼鹰”舰载运输机进行部署。
tgt: This will be the first time that Carl Vinson carries F-35C fighter and CMV-22 Osprey carrier transport aircraft to do the deployment.
hypo: This is the Charles de Gaulle aircraft carrier's first deployment of F-35C fighter jets and CMV-22 "Whale" transport planes.

src: 现在正在太平洋上游弋的美军航母，除了“卡尔·文森”号外，还有1月3日从美国出发的“亚伯拉罕·林肯”号（USS Abraham Lincoln）航母。
tgt: In addition to Carl Vinson, the US aircraft carriers cruising in the Pacific Ocean now also include the USS Abraham Lincoln, which departed from the United States on January 3.
hypo: The US Navy has two aircraft carriers currently deployed in the Pacific: the "Carl Vinson" and the "USS Abraham Lincoln" which departed the US on January 3rd.

src: “林肯”号也首次搭载了F-35C舰载机中队，该中队隶属美国海军陆战队的第314战斗机攻击中队。
tgt: USS Abraham Lincoln also carried the F-35C carrier based aircraft squadron for the first time, which belongs to the 314th Fighter Attack Squadron of the US Marine Corps.
hypo: The F-35C aircraft belonging to the U.S. Marine Corps' 31st Strike Fighter Squadron embarked on the USS Lincoln for the first time.

src: 除了上述两艘航母外，目前美国海军部署在亚太地区的还有停靠在日本横须贺的“里根”号（USS Ronald Reagan）航母。
tgt: Apart from the above two aircraft carriers, the US Navy currently also deploys the USS Ronald Reagan aircraft carrier, which is docked in Yokosuka, Japan, in the Asia Pacific region.
hypo: The US Navy has additional ships stationed in the Asia-Pacific region, including the "USS Ronald Reagan" in Japan.

src: 航母战斗群中还包括“尚普兰湖”号导弹巡洋舰、“斯托克达尔”号导弹驱逐舰等。
tgt: The aircraft carrier battle group also includes the missile cruiser “Champlain Lake” and guided missile destroyer “Stockdale”.
hypo: The battle group includes the missile cruiser "Peter the Great", as well as the destroyer escorts and other vessels.

src: 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 2022年1月17日，“南海战略态势感知平台”公布最新卫星图片，显示美军三艘航母正在中国周边集结。
tgt: Three US aircraft carriers are assembling around China; the most powerful weapon paid a visit to Guam in a rare case; on January 17, 2022, the “South China Sea Strategic Situation Detection Platform” released the latest satellite images, showing that three US aircraft carriers are assembling around China.
hypo: On January 17th, 2022, the "South China Sea Strategic Situation Awareness Platform" released the latest satellite images, showing three US Navy ships gathering near China.

src: （微博@南海战略态势感知） 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 2022年1月17日，美军舰载运输机CMV-22B飞行路线。
tgt: (Weibo @SouthChinaSeaStrategicSituationDetection) three US aircraft carriers assembled around China; the most powerful weapon paid a visit to Guam in a rare case; on January 17, 2022, the flight route of the US carrier-borne transport aircraft CMV-22B.
hypo: On January 17th, 20

src: （微博@南海战略态势感知） 另据美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）1月17日报道，美国海军武器库中最强大的武器之一上周末罕见地访问了关岛。
tgt: (Weibo @SouthChinaSeaStrategicSituationDetection) According to report of CNN on January 17, one of the most powerful weapons in the US Navy arsenal paid a visit to Guam in a rare case.
hypo: The US Navy's most powerful weapon visited Guam last week, as reported by CNN on January 17th.

src: 载有20枚三叉戟（Trident）弹道导弹和数十枚核弹头的俄亥俄级核潜艇“内华达号”（USS Nevada）上周六（1月15日）驶入美国关岛海军基地。
tgt: The Ohio class nuclear submarine USS Nevada, which carries 20 Trident ballistic missiles and dozens of nuclear warheads, entered the US naval base in Guam last Saturday (January 15).
hypo: The USS Nevada entered the US naval base at Guam on Saturday, January 15th.

src: 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 分析称，这是向印度-太平洋地区日益紧张的局势中的盟友和敌人发出了一个信号。
tgt: Three US aircraft carriers are assembling around China; the most powerful weapon paid a visit to Guam in a rare case; according to analysis, this is a signal to allies and enemies in the increasingly tense situation in the Indo-Pacific region.
hypo: The United States and its allies and adversaries in the Indo-Pacific region are increasingly tense, as evidenced by a signal being sent to Guam.

src: 这是美国弹道导弹潜艇自2016年以来首次访问关岛，也是自20世纪80年代以来第二次公开访问关岛。
tgt: This is the first visit to Guam by a US ballistic missile submarine since 2016 and the second public visit to Guam since the 1980s.
hypo: This is the first time a US submarine has visited Guam since 2016, and it is the second time Guam has been openly visited since the 80s.

src: 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 中国近年来在南沙群岛修建大批军事设施。
tgt: Three US aircraft carriers are assembling around China; the most powerful weapon paid a visit to Guam in a rare case; China has built a large number of military facilities in the Nansha Islands in recent years.
hypo: In recent years, China has been building military facilities on Guam and other islands in the South China Sea.

src: 图为中国在南沙群岛的永暑岛。
tgt: The picture shows China’s Yongshu Island in the Nansha Islands.
hypo: The South China Sea Islands.

src: （南海研究论坛） 美国海军在声明中称，俄亥俄级核潜艇“内华达号”此次对关岛的访问加强了美国和该地区盟友之间的合作，展示了美国的能力、灵活性、战备状态，以及对印太地区安全与稳定的持续承诺。
tgt: (South China Sea Research Forum) the U.S. Navy said in a statement that the visit of the Ohio class nuclear submarine “Nevada” to Guam strengthened the cooperation between the US and its allies in the region, demonstrated the ability, flexibility, combat readiness of the US, as well as its continued commitment to security and stability in the Indo-Pacific region.
hypo: The U.S. Navy declared in its statement that its visit to Guam strengthened cooperation between the U.S. and the region, demonstrated its capabilities, flexibility and readiness, and continued commitment to the security and stability of the Indo-Pacific region.

src: 弹道导弹潜艇通常被称为“雷鸣潜艇”（Boomer submarine）。
tgt: Ballistic missile submarines are often called “Boomer submarines”.
hypo: Ballistic missile submarines are usually referred to as "Boomer" submarines.

src: 美国海军舰队中14艘“雷鸣潜艇”的行踪通常是被严格保密的。
tgt: The whereabouts of the 14 “Boomer Submarines” in the US Navy fleet are usually strictly confidential.
hypo: The whereabouts of the 14 Boomer submarines in the US Navy are usually kept strictly confidential.

src: 围绕着弹道导弹潜艇的秘密使“雷鸣潜艇”成为“核三位一体中最重要的生存武器”，这一体系还包括位于美国本土的发射井弹道导弹，以及B-2和B-52等可携带核弹头的轰炸机。
tgt: The secret surrounding ballistic missile submarines makes “Boomer Submarine" the “most important survival weapon in the Nuclear Trinity”; this system also includes launching silo ballistic missile located in the US, as well as bombers such as B-2 and B-52 that can carry nuclear warheads.
hypo: The Boomer submarine system has become the most important survival weapon, which includes both domestic launch pads for missiles and B-2 and B-52 bombers that can carry nuclear missiles.

src: 跟朋友聊起最近Meta大跌 26%，市值蒸发 2510 亿美元，扎克伯格回应「面临前所未有的竞争」，原因为何？
tgt: I talked to my friend about the recent 26% plunge in Meta and its loss of US $251 billion in market value; Zuckerberg responded that he was “facing unprecedented competition”; why?
hypo: Facing unprecedented losses, Zuckerberg responded to the unprecedented competition.

src: Meta（原 Facebook）实质是一家广告公司，收入主要来自于广告，今时今日赚钱的广告公司，自己是有流量渠道的。
tgt: Meta (formerly Facebook) is essentially an advertising company, whose revenue mainly comes from advertising; the advertising company that makes money today has its own channel for traffic.
hypo: Facebook is essentially an advertising company, which earns most of its revenue from advertising. It is a company with its own traffic channels.

src: Facebook，Instagram，Whatsapp 等等，无论什么样的功能定位，都是 Meta 的流量渠道。
tgt: Regardless of its function positioning, Facebook, Instagram, Whatsapp, etc. are all channels of traffic for Meta.
hypo: No matter what kind of function it is, Facebook, Instagram, Whatsapp, etc., are all traffic channels for Meta.

src: 不仅如此，Meta 还是最大的”广告联盟”,很多 App 外接 Meta 的广告，通过 Meta 的广告平台是实现变现。
tgt: Not only that, Meta is also the biggest “advertisement alliance”; Many apps are externally connected to Meta’s advertising, and they achieve realization through Meta’s advertising platform.
hypo: Not only is Meta the biggest advertisement alliance, but many apps rely on Meta's advertisement platform to materialize their ads.

src: 但是，时代变了。
tgt: But, the time has changed.
hypo: However, times have changed.

src: 第一，因为苹果隐私政策的调整，Meta 很难再拿到用户的数据信息，影响了广告投放的效率。
tgt: First, due to the adjustment of Apple’s privacy policy, it is difficult for Meta to get users’ data information now, which affects the efficiency of advertising.
hypo: Because of the adjustments to Apple's privacy policy, Meta finds it difficult to obtain user data, which has affected the efficiency of advertising.

src: 苹果现在的隐私政策对用户很友好，会很明显的提示用户是否允许 App 获取自己的信息，大多数人的正常反应肯定是不允许。
tgt: Apple’s current privacy policy is very user-friendly; it will use explicit prompt to ask users whether they allow apps to access their own information; most people’s normal reaction is definitely not to allow it.
hypo: Apple's privacy policy is very user-friendly and will clearly indicate whether users allow the app to access their information, which is most likely not allowed.

src: 接下来如果 Google 再捅一刀，对 Meta 的收入影响还会更大。
tgt: If Google stabs again next, it will have a greater impact on Meta’s revenue.
hypo: If Google slices again, the impact on Meta's income will be even greater.

src: 第二，以前 Meta 的收入增长里的中国因素也弱化了（这个因素的比重不确定有多高，但确实存在）。
tgt: Second, the Chinese factor in Meta’s revenue growth has also been weakened (the proportion of this factor is uncertain, but it does exist).
hypo: Previously, the Chinese factor weakened alongside revenue growth (the weight of this factor is uncertain, but it definitely exists).

src: 大家平时都知道 Meta 在中国是没有业务的，但是这个理解并不准确。
tgt: We all know that Meta doesn’t have business in China, but this understanding is not accurate.
hypo: We all know that Meta is not doing business in China, but this understanding is not accurate.

src: 每年 Meta 至少10%的收入都来自中国，主要是中国做出海业务的公司贡献的。
tgt: At least 10% of Meta’s revenue comes from China every year, mainly contributed by Chinese companies engaged in offshore business.
hypo: Each year, at least 10% of a company's income comes from China, mainly from Chinese companies engaged in maritime activities.

src: Meta 在香港的办公室大概几百人，在大陆还有几大代理商。
tgt: There are around hundreds of staff at its Hong Kong office and several major agents in the mainland.
hypo: There are roughly a hundred people working in the Hong Kong office, with a few dozen agents working on the mainland.

src: 中国公司想要拓展海外市场，Meta 都是绕不过的广告渠道，烧的钱大多都给了 Meta。
tgt: When Chinese companies want to expand overseas market, Meta is an advertising channel that cannot be bypassed, and so most of the money is given to Meta.
hypo: Companies want to expand their overseas market, and advertising is the key to success. The money they spend on advertising is usually given to overseas markets.

src: 有意思的是，现在字节的 TT 是 Meta 主要的竞争对手之一，但是前两年 Meta 从字节身上可赚到不少钱。
tgt: Interestingly, the TT of ByteDance now is one of Meta’s main competitors, but Meta made a lot of money from ByteDance in the past two years.
hypo: ByteDance is one of the major competitors of TT, but in the past two years, ByteDance has made a lot of money from TT.

src: 国内各个代理都在帮字节去 Meta 那里投广告，Meta 大中华区的业绩也很不错。
tgt: All domestic agents are helping ByteDance to do advertising at Meta, and Meta’s performance in Greater China is also very good.
hypo: ByteDance is very popular in the Chinese market, and the performance of the Chinese region is also very good.

src: 最近我没有专门去了解，但是肯定不会比之前好。
tgt: I haven’t specifically learned about it recently, but it’s definitely not better than before.
hypo: I haven't specifically gone to understand it, but I'm sure it will be better than before.

src: 中国公司在海外大规模烧钱的阶段已经过去了。
tgt: The stage when Chinese companies were burning money overseas on a large scale has passed.
hypo: Chinese companies have already passed the stage of burning money overseas.

src: 第三，新的流量渠道拓展不顺利。
tgt: Third, the expansion of new traffic channels is not smooth.
hypo: The third new channel expansion was not going smoothly.

src: Facebook 越来越老了，新的包括 TT 在内的平台，都不在 Meta 手中。
tgt: Facebook is getting older, and new platforms including TT is not in the hands of Meta.
hypo: Facebook is getting older, and the new platforms it includes are not in Meta's hands.

src: 最大的问题不仅仅是收入下滑，而是缺乏增长预期。
tgt: The biggest problem is not the decline of revenue but lack of growth expectation.
hypo: The biggest problem is not only a decrease in income, but also a lack of growth expectation.

src: 资本市场不仅仅看中收入，更重要的是看未来的预期怎么样。
tgt: The capital market not only focuses on income; more importantly, it depends on future expectations.
hypo: The capital market is not just about looking at past income, it's also important to look at future expectations.

src: 很显然，Meta 的预期是不够的。
tgt: Obviously, the expectation for Meta is not enough.
hypo: It is obvious that Meta's expectations were not met.

src: 为了给市场讲出新的故事，扎克伯格讲了 “元宇宙”.
tgt: In order to tell new stories to the market, Zuckerberg told the story about “Meta-universe”.
hypo: Zuckerberg told the story of a new universe.

src: 元宇宙确实应该是未来的方向之一，但是元宇宙的实现周期比较长，这个故事在这两三年应该不足以支撑起 Meta 的市值。
tgt: Meta-universe indeed should be one of the future directions, but the period of the realization of Meta-universe is long, and this story is not sufficient to support the market value of Meta.
hypo: The Meta-universe is one of the possible directions for the future, but its realization period is much longer than this story can support.

src: 所以未来这两年，应该是 Meta 比较艰难的时期。
tgt: Therefore, the next two years should be a difficult time for Meta.
hypo: Therefore, the next two years will be more difficult than ever.

src: 别看脸书现在非常的风光，每年也有1,000亿到2,000亿美元的收入，实际上脸书现在危机感非常强，跟其他的互联网企业和高科技公司相比，没有什么好的安全的护城河。
tgt: Although Facebook is very popular now with an annual income of US $100 billion to $200 billion; in fact, Facebook has a strong sense of crisis; compared with other Internet companies and high-tech companies, there is not any good security moat.
hypo: Although Facebook has a good security moat, its income is still very vulnerable to risks, compared to other internet companies and high-tech firms.

src: 虽然他的几款社交软件现在的日活比较高，也是主流的社交软件，比如Facebook，WhatsApp等等，但是面对tiktok的快速发展，脸书也没有什么信心，颠覆之间也就是眨眼的功夫。
tgt: Although the DAU of several of his social software is relatively high, and they are mainstream social software such as Facebook, WhatsApp; however, in the face of the rapid development of TikTok, Facebook has little confidence, and subversion could happen in the blink of an eye.
hypo: Despite the popularity of various social media platforms nowadays, such as Facebook, WhatsApp, etc., TikTok's rapid growth has made them feel insecure, and they are resorting to underhanded tactics to stay afloat.

src: 而搞元宇宙这个可望而不可及的概念，短时间之内完全没有成功的希望，因此脸书非常的危险，这也是为什么扎克伯格又是换公司的名字，又是不停的寻找新的赛道的根本原因，但是我觉得他的赛道选择是错的，是一条不归路 以上是我的一些思考，供参考。
tgt: The unattainable concept of meta universe has no hope of success in a short time, so Facebook is in danger; this is also the fundamental reason why Zuckerberg changed the name of the company and kept looking for new tracks, but I think his choice is wrong and there is no way back; the above is some of my thoughts for reference.
hypo: Zuckerberg changed his company's name, which is why he is always searching for new paths, but I think his choice is wrong. It is my opinion that he is going down the wrong path.

src: 第十七条 国家对注册消防工程师资格实行注册执业管理制度。
tgt: Article 17 The state implements the registration and practice management system for the qualification of certified Fire Engineers.
hypo: The seventeenth article establishes a registration and licensing system for firefighters.

src: 取得一级、二级注册消防工程师资格证书的人员，经注册方可以相应级别注册消防工程师名义执业。
tgt: People who obtained the Level 1 and Level 2 qualification certificates of registered Fire Engineers can practice in the name of registered Fire Engineers of corresponding level.
hypo: Individuals who have obtained the registered Firefighter certification can practice the profession corresponding to their level of registration.

src: 第十八条 公安部消防局是一级注册消防工程师资格的注册审批部门。
tgt: Article 18 The Fire Department of the Ministry of Public Security is the registration and approval department of the qualification of Level 1 registered Fire Engineer.
hypo: The Registration and Approval Department of the Public Security Bureau is the first-level registration of fire engineering qualification.

src: 省、自治区、直辖市公安机关消防机构为二级注册消防工程师资格的注册审批部门，并负责一级注册消防工程师资格注册的初步审查工作。
tgt: The fire departments of the public security organs of provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government are the registration and approval departments for the qualification of Level 2 registered Fire Engineers, and are responsible for the preliminary review of the qualification of registration of Level 1 registered Fire Engineers.
hypo: The registration department of the provincial/municipal public security bureau is responsible for the registration of secondary firefighter qualifications and the initial review of the registration of primary firefighter qualifications.

src: 第十九条 取得一级、二级注册消防工程师资格证书并申请注册的人员，应当受聘于一个经批准的消防技术服务机构或者消防安全重点单位，并通过聘用单位向本单位所在地(聘用单位属企业的，通过本企业向工商注册所在地)的公安机关消防机构提交注册申请材料。
tgt: Article 19 A person who has obtained the qualification certificate of Level 1 and Level 2 registered Fire Engineer and applies for registration shall be employed by an approved fire protection technical service institution or key fire safety unit, and the employer shall submit registration application materials to the fire protection institution of the public security organ in the place where the employer is located (if the employer is an enterprise, it shall be submitted to the place where the industrial and commercial registration is located).
hypo: The individual applying for the job should be hired by a fire safety service organization that has been approved by the local government, and the employer should submit the application materials to the local public security bureau.

src: 第二十条 省、自治区、直辖市公安机关消防机构在收到申请人的注册申请材料后，对申请材料不齐全或者不符合法定形式的，应当当场或者在5个工作日内，一次 性告知申请人需要补正的全部内容，逾期不告知的，自收到申请材料之日起即为受理。
tgt: Article 20 After receiving the registration application materials of the applicant, the fire protection institutions of the public security organs of provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the central government shall inform the applicant of all the contents that need to be supplemented and corrected all at once on the spot or within 5 working days if the application materials are incomplete or do not conform to the legal form; if they fail to inform within the time limit, they will be accepted from the date of receiving the application materials.
hypo: After the local public security, fire prevention and control departments receive an applicant's registration materials, if the materials are incomplete or do not conform to the prescribed form, they should notify the applicant of the missing information within 5 working days. If the missing information is not provided within the time limit, the application will be deemed to have been withdrawn.

src: 对受理或者不予受理的注册申请，均应当出具加盖本级公安机关消防机构专用印章和注明日期的书面凭证。
tgt: For the registration applications that are accepted or rejected, a written certificate stamped with the special seal of the fire protection institution of the public security organ at the same level and date shall be issued.
hypo: Regardless of whether the application is accepted or rejected, it should be accompanied by a firearm license issued by a public security organ and a date stamp.

src: 第二十一条 省、自治区、直辖市公安机关消防机构自受理注册申请之日起20个工作日内，按规定条件和程序完成一级注册消防工程师资格注册申请材料的初步审查工作和二级注册消防工程师资格的注册审批工作，并将一级注册消防工程师资格注册申请材料和初步审查意见报公安部消防局审批。
tgt: Article 21 The fire protection institutions of the public security organs of provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the central government shall, within 20 working days after the date of accepting the registration application, complete the preliminary review of the application materials for the registration of the Level 1 registered Fire Engineer qualification and the registration and approval of the Level 2 registered Fire Engineer qualification according to the specified conditions and procedures, and submit the application materials for the registration of the Level 1 registered Fire Engineer qualification and the preliminary review opinions to the Fire Department of the Ministry of Public Security for approval.
hypo: The local public security bureau shall complete the initial review of the fire protection engineer qualification registration application materials within 20 workdays and the secondary review of the fire protection engineer qualification registration within 30 workdays.

src: 公安部消防局应当自收到省级公安机关消防机构报送的申请材料和初步审查意见之日起，20个工作日内作出是否批准的决定。
tgt: The Fire Department of the Ministry of Public Security shall make a decision on whether to approve or not within 20 working days from the date of receiving the application materials and preliminary review opinions submitted by the Fire Department of the provincial public security organ.
hypo: The Fire Department should make a decision within 20 days of receiving the application material and initial opinion from the provincial public security bureau.

src: 在规定的期限内不能作出批准决定的，应当将延长的期限和理由告知申请人。
tgt: If the approval decision cannot be made within the prescribed time limit, the applicant shall be informed of the extended time limit and the reason.
hypo: If the approval shall be extended, the reason shall be notified to the applicant.

src: 对作出不予批准决定的，应当书面说明理由，并告知申请人享有依法申请行政复议或者提起行政诉讼的权利。
tgt: If the decision of disapproval is made, the reasons shall be explained in writing, and the applicant shall be informed of the right to apply for administrative reconsideration or file an administrative lawsuit according to law.
hypo: Apply for or file an administrative appeal or lawsuit to challenge the decision.

src: 第二十二条 注册审批部门应当自作出批准决定之日起10个工作日内，颁发、送达相应级别的注册证。
tgt: Article 22 The registration review and approval department shall issue and deliver the registration certificate of the corresponding level within 10 working days from the date of making the approval decision.
hypo: The Registration Office should issue the registration certificate within 10 days of receiving the application, and send it to the corresponding level.

src: 第二十三条 注册证的每一注册有效期为3年。
tgt: Article 23 The period of validity is 3 years for each registration period of the registration certificate.
hypo: Registration is valid for 3 years.

src: 注册证在有效期内是相应级别注册消防工程师的执业凭证，由注册消防工程师本人保管、使用。
tgt: The registration certificate is the practicing certificate of the registered Fire Engineer of the corresponding level within the period of validity, which is kept and used by the registered Fire Engineer themselves.
hypo: The English translation for this sentence is: Make sure to use the appropriate level of registration certificates for registration of firefighters, which should be kept and used by the firefighter himself.

src: 第二十四条 申请初始注册的，应当自取得一级、二级注册消防工程师资格证书之日起1年内提出申请。
tgt: Article 24 Initial registration shall be applied within 1 year from the date of obtaining the qualification certificate of Level 1 and Level 2 registered Fire Engineer.
hypo: Applicants for initial registration shall submit the relevant qualification certificates within one year from the date of application.

src: 逾期申请初始注册时，须符合本规定继续教育要求。
tgt: When applying for initial registration beyond the time limit, it must meet the requirements on continuing education in this Regulation.
hypo: When applying for initial registration, you must meet the relevant educational requirements.

src: 初始注册、延续注册、变更注册、注销注册和不予注册等注册管理的具体办法，由公安部另行规定。
tgt: The specific measures for registration administration of initial registration, continuation of registration, change of registration, cancellation of registration and not-approved registration shall be separately formulated by the Ministry of Public Security.
hypo: The specific procedures for initial registration, renewal registration, change of registration, cancellation of registration, and refusal of registration are prescribed by the Ministry of Public Security.

src: 第二十五条 继续教育是注册消防工程师延续注册、重新注册和逾期初始注册的必备条件。
tgt: Article 25 Continuation of Education is a necessary condition for the continuation of registration, re-registration and overdue initial registration of registered Fire Engineers.
hypo: Article 25: Re-registration, re-registration, and overdue initial registration are the necessary conditions for continuing education.

src: 在每个注册有效期内，各级别注册消防工程师应当按照规定完成相应的继续教育。
tgt: Within the period of validity of each registration, registered Fire Engineer of different levels shall complete the corresponding continuation of education according to the regulations.
hypo: During each registration period, firefighters of all levels must complete the required education according to regulations.

src: 第二十六条 注册审批部门应当及时向社会公告注册消防工程师注册有关情况，建立注册消防工程师诚信档案，对其执业活动实行信用管理。
tgt: Article 26 The registration review and approval department shall timely announce the registration of registered Fire Engineers to the public, establish the integrity archives of registered Fire Engineers, and implement credit management on their practices.
hypo: The department shall timely announce the registration of firefighters and establish a credible file of registration, and manage the professional activities of firefighters in a trustworthy manner.

src: 第二十七条 各级注册消防工程师资格的注册管理部门，应当严格执行《中华人民共和国行政许可法》有关规定。
tgt: Article 27 The registration administration departments for the qualification of registered Fire Engineers at all levels shall strictly implement the relevant provisions of the Administrative License Law of the people’s Republic of China.
hypo: The registration department of each level of firefighter qualification should strictly abide by the provisions of the Chinese Administrative Permit Law and relevant regulations.

src: 今日的考试资讯分享到此为止，希望能给大家一些帮助。
tgt: This is the end of the sharing of today’s examination information; I hope this will be helpful to you.
hypo: Today's exam information has been shared, and I hope it helps everyone.

src: 大家一定要努力备考，争取早日通过消防工程师考试！
tgt: Everyone, please work hard on this and hopefully you will pass the Fire Engineer examination soon!
hypo: Everyone has to put in effort to prepare for the exam and compete to pass the Fire Engineer exam early!

src: 实时分享金融/财会/建筑最新考试资讯。
tgt: Real time sharing of the latest examination information of Finance/ Accounting/Architecture.
hypo: Sharing the latest financial, accounting and construction exam information.
